Title: The History of Journalism and its Modernization in the Beijing Time
Abstract: The freedom of the press was relatively free in the duration of Beiyang governance in Chinese journalism history, although this kind of freedom resulted from the government's weakness and incompetence both at home and abroad. The categories of news media were various at this time. Besides newspaper and periodical still as the principle parts, the news agency started to move towards the professional path, the broadcasting station also was born, as well as the internal operation of journalism industry displayed the prosperity and progress despite of the imbalance development within the industry. The foreword mainly elaborated the background and significance of the topic, the literature review, the research scope, the limitation of partial concepts, the research method as well as the innovation and insufficiency of the paper. The 1st chapter summarizes the political, economic, ideological and cultural condition in the duration of Beiyang governance. The paper strives to discover the background resources with direct relation between the environment and the journalism industry when describing the media external ecological social environment, not adopting the traditional descriptive research method. Due to the weakness of the central government and the confronting balance of local government, the media environment was relatively loose, and there were not any laws to regulate the journalism industry, plus deprived of jurisdiction right in the concession area, all of these factors provided protection for the development of journalism macroscopically. During the 1st World War, China’s national capital force was emerging, progress was made by the railway and posting system, population increase and education improvement, liberation on the thinking and revolution of Chinese literature also provided rare and proper external environment for the development of journalism industry. However, the publishing machinery and papermaking industry were still weak; the government paid a big purchase on such steps and made a great loss for the journalism industry. Nevertheless, under such macro-environment, the categories of newspaper varied, quantity increased, and circulation volume tended to increase and national journalism network came into being. The 2nd chapter elaborated the burgeoning condition of the national official newspaper at this time. After the founding of Minguo China, the national official newspaper were prosperously developed, not only categories varied and the ministries also established internal journals, but also the official newspaper started to break away from folk journalism’s running model, became a kind of authoritative publications releasing national laws and regulations with initial characteristics. After summarized the principle developing history of national official newspaper, the characteristics of its managing system and function features, the paper made an emphasis on introducing some central official newspapers and important local official newspapers under different governance nationwide. The 3rd chapter was on the Party newspapers. The paper analyzed the other important branch newspaper published by the Communist Party of China and Kuomintang respectively. The author held the opinion that the core research value was that how the newspapers were ran, managed and employed by the party. The paper emphasized the internal operation of such newspapers. The KMT put most effort on the battles at that time, the founding and organization of its propaganda ministry experienced a path from lacking of emphasis to become important, and the directional struggle causing from the propaganda ministry also displayed the fierce level of disputes within KMT itself. Thus the party newspapers were relatively disorder at this stage, each newspaper only earn for itself, the control of KMT to such newspapers relied most on the allowances distribution. After the corporation between KMT and CPC, with the help of CPC, KMT’s administrative agency began to manage and regulate journalism effectively, worked out the guidelines for propaganda activities. Since the birth of its own journalism, CPC displayed strong characteristics of strict discipline and management consciousness, besides this, then CPC was a branch of the International Communist Unity, both the Soviet Communist Party and the International Communist Unity gave directions and support to the publication of CPC, the ideological journalism concept of CPC thereby came into being. The paper also introduced important publications of both parties according to their birth time. The 4th chapter was on commercial newspaper. The core research value of the commercial publication was that how they ran, managed and became enterprises. This chapter used another research method because the following chapters would elaborate this chapter’s questions respectively, that was China’s commercial newspapers displayed obvious diversity in different locations, due to the imbalance of economic development and differences of cultural tradition in different areas. During this time, the commercial newspaper in Shanghai was relatively developed, and then Tianjin and the country’s north area and southeast coastal cities, as the political centre, however, the commercial newspaper in Beijing developed slowly. The paper introduced important commercial newspapers according to the location and highlighted their features on the operating model and culture characteristics. The 5th chapter is on religious newspaper. This kind of publication’s intention was to preach religion, therefore their operation and management were not the core research value, the paper implied quantitative and qualitative analysis methods simultaneously to display their basic developing condition at that time. The paper concluded that Catholic and Christian publication were spread comparatively widely through analysis, some of them specialized preaching religious doctrines and totally made it as the principle, others of them were more social and popular and occupying a more widely circulation. There were also censoring system to this kind of religious publication especially by Catholic preaching organs. The publication of Buddhism was also prosperous at the early period of Minguo, coincided with China’s Buddhism Innovation and Saving-Country Movement, many publications on Buddhism appeared, although most of them were short-live, the most important publication on Buddhism also born at this time. As for the Taoism, Confucianism and Muslim, there were publications founded by these religions respectively. The paper also made introduction about them. The 6th chapter was on news agency and broadcasting station. The paper paid attention to the China’s important local news agency at that time, because the international news agency almost monopolized China’s report to the outside world at that time, the appeal for establishing China’s own news agency was strong. Due to lack of techniques, funding and realization, most of the important news agencies were local ones within the country. As on the professional level, they could not compete with the international agency. The paper made introductions about the important news agencies and their operation. The broadcasting station also founded by the foreigners, however, national broadcasting station appeared rapidly, at these stations’ early developing stage, they were not featured with news reporting but music and entertainment parts etc, likewise their profitability mainly relied on selling radio machines and other electronic products. The 7th chapter was on the modernization of journalism industry. Words ever said by Mcluhan: Media is technique. Without support of techniques, it is impossible for the journalism industry modernized. However, modernization cannot be built all over the night; there are different criterions in different developing periods. At the early time of Minguo, the modernization on the news media mostly displayed on the buildings started to be built by few newspaper owners, but less set up internal department collecting and sorting news resources. Communication techniques such as cable and telephone were started to be used, though there were disputes on charging system between the newspaper office and the government, negotiation made by them for a few times. Big news office started to utilize developed rotating printing machine worldwide, and national produced printing machine began to be adopted and accepted by the whole journalism industry, and more news office only rent the printing factory’s machine to publish newspaper, besides funding and technique, the realization also hindered the modernization as far as the journalism industry concerned. The 8th chapter was on the modernization of the operating model of journalism industry. Shareholding system began to become the principle operating model for the news office. As on the internal organization, professional division of labor conforming to modern journalism operation appeared, departments of reporting, editing, operating and managing separated respectively, the coordinating department began to be adopted for more efficient news reporting, circulation and advertisement gains. As on the human resources, occupational journalists appeared, however, full-time and high-qualified journalists’ inadequacy displayed its underdeveloped condition at that time. Comparatively mature and complete regulations on the staff’s treatment such as wages and benefits also appeared. On the whole, the operating model displayed diversity and imbalance features due to news office’s development, regional culture and economic developing level etc. The 9th chapter was on the modernization on management of journalism industry. The paper mainly focused on funding, circulation and advertisement. Influenced by the whole developing level of journalism industry, many news media ever supported with financial assistance by the government and party. As on the circulation, the journalism industry in Southern area restricted by newspaper dealers, a few famous newspapers set low price compared with the cost and mainly relied on the advertisement gains; there were a little bit better in the Northern area due to less pages and income on the circulation; the news office usually adopted self-circulating way or set branch selling office on non-local circulation. The 10th chapter elaborated the modernization of journalism practice. There were more channels collecting news, although still not getting rid of the high dependence of external resources, the percentage of self-collecting news still relatively low, news types were comparatively comprehensive, certain standard began to be set for the news writing, significant improvement got on both the quantity and quality of the newspaper, emerged a few famous journalists such as ShaoPiaoping specializing in news reporting and writing. As on the comments, not only more types, but also featured on the timely affairs. The separated editing method was replaced by the integrated one on the page lay outing; well-chosen concepts became the model for the editors to copy and learn. However, the whole relatively low quality, prevalence of fake news, use of the classical Chinese on most newspapers were the shortcomings for the modernization of journalism practice The 11th chapter was on the modernization of journalism theory and concept. The recognition on the concept and function of newspaper improved significantly and professionally within the industry, comparatively conscious realization on the industry’s status quo came into being, politically-independent, freedom of expression and economically-independent aspects were be regarded as the most important quality for the newspaper itself. The principle of “Intellectuals Commenting Politics” was adopted by many newspapers and became an important part for this time’s journalism theory. Especially the philosophy of “4-Don’ts” addressed by Xinji《DaGongBao》established in Tianjin and its successful practice of this philosophy made the principle become mature at this time. Besides, the tendency of professionalism appeared within the industry and made some statement about how to protect news sources, commerciality and copyright of news. Due to the tumultuous governance of Beiyang governance and turbulent social condition, the appeal on the freedom of news media was strong as a whole industry and adopted many measures to strive for it, at the same time, higher standard on the professional ethics for the journalists and editors required, although few qualified. Journalism groups, research groups and groups within the industry also developed from nationwide to locally.

Title: Research on the Law Governing the Development of Advanced Productive Forces
Abstract: Advanced productive forces refer to the strongest abilities to solve the contradictions between human and nature, human and society and among humans in established time and space. They follow and represent the laws on development of human society from lower to higher stages, and also represent the highest level of human seeking perfect combination of the true, the good and the beautiful in its production activities. Advanced productive forces are implemented by advanced laborers and generally have clear and advanced instruments of production as symbols of their existence. Contrasted with general and backward productive forces, advanced productive forces have their own specificity besides the universality of general productive forces. Seen from their position and role in the productive system, advanced productive forces have characteristics of pilot and creation; seen from their function, they have distinct people-first value orientation; seen from their developing level and trend, they have characters of high efficiency and revolutionary. The development course of advanced productive forces is complicated and volatile, and lots of aspects are involved in the motive basis of their birth and growth, which is different according to time, space and country. The motive basis of the birth and development of advanced productive forces, however, can be come down to three aspects, which are technical, institutional and structural basis respectively. First, science and technology leads and impulse the birth and growth of advanced productive forces. The systems of technological innovation, shift from scientific technology to advanced productive forces, check and balance of the contradictions in the operation of the scientific technology, and personnel resources, which are linked to each other, are specific contents and realizing steps; second, as the motive force of the birth and growth of advanced productive forces, institution creativity has such functions as clearing the way for the birth of advanced productive forces, providing guaranty for the development of advanced productive forces, and influencing and regulating the value direction of the development of advanced productive forces. Third, advanced productive forces is a complicated and giant system with various internal elements interacting and cooperating with each other, meanwhile harmoniously developing with the external integrated environment, which includes such aspects as politics, economy and nature. The condition of the elements of productive forces harmoniously combining and collocating with each other, the harmonious allocation model of the macrostructure of productive forces, and the advantage brought by the integrated harmony of the external environment of productive forces, which refer to the integrated advantage of various elements such as nature, economy, society, labor, ecology and institution, is both the motive basis of the birth of advanced productive forces and important guaranty of the healthy and stable growth of advanced productive forces. In practice, advanced productive forces have external manifestation, which means advanced productive forces always progress in certain time and space. Seen from time series, advanced productive forces appear as vertical growth, which means such upgrading movement of advanced productive forces in time series as inoculation, birth, growth, maturity and regeneration caused by such elements as scientific-technical progress, social need, political revolution, and process improvement in certain space; seen from the space connection, advanced productive forces appear as transversal flow, which means the process in which advanced productive forces expand in quantity and evolve in quality with the change of space in certain time, and thus display certain congestion, transition and layout in space. The vertical growth and transversal flow of advanced productive forces are the two basic forms of the development of advanced productive forces, which control, act and accelerate each other and motivate advanced productive forces to grow in flow and flow in growth. The process of combined action appears as an interaction course between advanced productive forces and the other components of the productive system, i.e., non-advanced productive forces. By inheriting and innovating, merging and absorbing, and reforming and sublating the non-advanced productive forces, advanced productive forces realize their own development and promote the level of the whole productive forces of human society. On the whole, the birth and development of advanced productive forces is a spiraling course of the negation of negation. Advanced productive forces of every generation are all breakthrough and innovation based on those of the past generation. The advanced productive forces in the period of industrial civilization, i.e. traditional industrial productive forces, once made outstanding contributions to the development of human society, but due to the evolution of its own contradictions and the change of the core of the development of the times, traditional industrial productive forces are faced with a series of serious obstacles and bottleneck in our era. In present era, we must survey and judge the scientific connotation of advanced productive forces with brand new view and scientific approach of development to develop advanced productive forces in human society, that is to say, we should break through the mentality of resting on the aspect of technical level and short-term production effect, and establish a synthetic, stereoscopic, and comprehensive system of analysis and assessment from the angel of the law governing the whole human ecology and progress of the human civilization. In such a new view, the advanced productive forces of the present era should not be unilaterally accessed with only the quantity concerned, but be comprehensively accessed with both of the quality and quantity concerned, and should be shifted from unary form of satisfying the material requisite to plural form of satisfying the requisite of ecology, material and spirit, and from one-dimensional conquest from to double-dimensional harmony form. Therefore, the advanced productive forces of the present era come into being and develop with advanced science and technology as their material basis, meeting the human’s real demand as their value orientation, and sustainable development as their basic criterion. Assessing the display form of the advanced productive forces of the present era in such a completely new view and grading scale, we can find that among the various forms of the advanced productive forces of the present era, information, culture, and ecology productive forces are the most three representative ones. The birth and growth of the three forms of advanced productive forces is a fundamental revolution to the traditional industrial productive forces. Their birth and growth not only motivates the production system to greatly change and the social economy to grow forward, but also deeply influence the political and cultural life of the society, and even the living style of the human, thus bring great changes to the whole human society. To every country of the present era, it is a strategic mission to develop the three forms of advanced productive forces. To some developing countries, however, industrialization has not been completed yet and more advanced forms of productive forces are needed to be developed with the world’s advanced productive forces as a reference system, therefore most of the countries are faced with the double mission of developing productive forces. Leapfrog development is an effective way for these countries to quickly catch up with the developed countries. After the world history came into being, lots of developing countries began a campaign of catching up the world’s powerful countries of advanced productive forces, among which there is no lack of successful cases of leapfrog development. For example, during the period of the first industrial revolution, the United Kingdom was vaulted from an ordinary island country to the world’s factory through leapfrog development of productive forces; during the period of the second industrial revolution, Germany and the United States realized their position of powerful country in economy, science and technology through leapfrog development of productive forces. The implementation of leapfrog development of productive forces, however, depends on the combined action of various aspects, such as strong support of the government and basic institutional improvement, open market economy system, necessary preparation of manpower and material, and close relationship among the technology centre abroad and at home, meanwhile the principles of growth at an appropriate speed, coordinated development, approach with domestic characteristics, and priority to efficiency with due consideration to fairness are required to be followed. In the course of implementing leapfrog development of productive forces, there are various possible approaches, among which the most representative three ones are imitating innovation, transplanting innovation, and integrating innovation. Every country can choose different approach of leapfrog development of productive forces according to their own natural talents and environmental conditions. In today’s China, the development of advanced productive forces must be established on the most two crucial bases, that is, clearly mastering the developing level and state of the advanced productive forces in the world today and deeply understanding the whole status of development of the productive forces in China today. The former is the basic point of departure and the latter the essential and long-standing factor of the development of the advanced productive forces in China. It is necessary to combine the two organically and dialectically to establish the strategic target and supplementing approach of the development of the advanced productive forces in China. Based on the actual condition of the development of productive forces in China today and combined with the changes in environment abroad and at home, such as the springing up of the world’s advanced productive forces, which include information, culture and ecology productive forces, adhering to the approach of new type of industrialization is a dialectic and organic combination of global views and China’s actual conditions of the development of productive forces, a correct developing strategy in accordance with the law governing the development of advanced productive forces, and the core content of the implementation of leapfrog development of productive forces. The combination of promoting simultaneously with breakthroughs made in key areas and promoting hierarchically with the precursors stimulating the straggler is an available approach to carry out the new type of industrialization. Promoting simultaneously with breakthroughs made in key areas means adhering to the measure of developing simultaneously both industrialization and informationization, government steering and market promoting, shift in the mode of economic growth and transition of economic system, and developing science and technology and comprehensively vitalizing education at the same time of consolidating the advantages of manufacturing industry; promoting hierarchically with the precursors stimulating the straggler means implementing the strategy of uneven growth with the developed areas stimulating and helping the developing areas, the leading industries stimulating and helping other industries. Promoting simultaneously with breakthroughs made in key areas and promoting hierarchically with the precursors stimulating the straggler are is connected to each other, and is a feasible move to implement the strategy of leapfrog development of productive forces.

Title: The Rhetoric and Reality of Intellectual Property: A Critical History of Copyrights, Patents, and Trademarks
Abstract: This thesis offers an historical study on intellectual property laws in the west, particularly in the Anglo-American countries. It does not attempt to reiterate all the events along with the development of intellectual property laws, but seeks to analyze and evaluate the social forces that work behind the development of intellectual property laws over the past several hundred years. The central questions of this thesis are why intellectual property laws (traditionally including copyrights, patents, and trademarks) took place in the west and what forces are pushing forward the development of intellectual property laws. The thesis is divided into five chapters. Chapters 1 and 2 study the origin and development of copyright in early England, the formation and transformation of copyright in the United States, and also discuss the international expansion of copyright system through two case studies: copyright discussions between England and the United States during the 19th century, and intellectual property negotiations between the United States and China in the late 20th century. Chapters 3 and 4 investigate the origin of patent system in Europe, the development of English patent law and its complex relationship with the Industrial Revolution, the anti-patent movement during 1850-1875, the evolution of American patent law, and the rapid expansion of patent law in the late 20th century etc. Chapter 5 traces the early development of trademark protection in Europe, and also offers a comprehensive survey on the transformation of trademark law in the United States in the 20th century. The conclusions of this thesis are as follows: First, intellectual property systems originated from the need of a trade policy to regulate commercial competition after the rise of capitalism. Second, merchants have continuously been the driving force for the birth and development of intellectual property systems, and have also been the major beneficiary of intellectual property protections. The so-called creators such as authors or inventors serve as media for such protections and are only incidental beneficiaries of the intellectual property systems. Third, the nature of intellectual property systems is to create and enforce limited monopolies, and to recognize the right of merchants to monopolize certain trade by restricting competition and regulating the commerce. The involvement and support of the state is the necessary condition for the existence of these intellectual property systems. Fourth, in order to persuade the state and the society to support and to accept the intellectual property systems, merchants employ various rhetorical strategies and construct romantic authors, romantic inventors, and romantic consumers as representations for the intellectual property protections. As a result of rationalizing efforts of the legislations and the court adjudications, such romantic ideas have been fairly accepted by the society and have become the legitimate foundations for the existence of copyrights, patents, and trademarks. Fifth, in the rhetorical discourses authors, inventors, and consumers are represented as subjects of intellectual property laws, but in the real world they often become the objects to be regulated by the intellectual property laws. Also, the unorganized public often becomes the losers in the intellectual property games as they are not able to make sufficiently strong voices in the legislation process and also cannot defeat the wealthy and powerful merchants in the judicial proceedings. Last but not least, to have a better future for intellectual property systems it would be desirable to achieve an optimal balance among creators, merchants, and the public. Conventional wisdom often focuses on the balance between the interests of creators and the public interests, but intentionally or inadvertently ignores the position of merchants in the intellectual property systems. In that sense, the merchants can always hide behind the creators to push forward the expansion of intellectual property protections in the name of creators. As a matter of fact, intellectual property rights, as a bundle of rights, consist of the rights of different holders to control and use certain objects, such as the right of creators for creative use, the right of merchants for commercial use, and the right of the public for private use. The purpose of intellectual property laws should only secure the right of the merchants against unfair competition use to the extent that the right of creators for creative use and the right of the public for private use would not be injured. Based on the survey of a long-span history, this thesis attempts to offer an analysis framework to reveal the common features of copyrights, patents, and trademarks, and also to provide reasonable interpretations for various problems asscoiated with the development of intellectual property laws. In addition, this thesis also offers a new perspective to understand the operation of the capitalist system as well as the social forces working behind the development of general legal rules.

Title: The Analysis of Chinese Mass Culture
Abstract: Mass Culture, which has another name called popular culture or populace culture, is a social culture phenomenon appearing in the process of urbanization and industrialization, and a tendency to develop culture directly being associated with Consumer Society. As forming the factor intricately, the range in the ascendant, popular of development trend involves the global new-type culture form, mass culture has already caused the extensive concern of Chinese and foreign scholars, The studying about it has already been launched in different disciplines, research of different angles and different aspects. Though the academia does not have a final conclusion to the essential intension of mass culture, yet at present there are different judgments on its social functions, and opinions vary to its development prospects. But, urgent need and historical mission of the socialist spiritual civilization developed on the basis of Chinese nation's advanced culture, there are positive theory and practice meanings in the analysis of the mass culture phenomenon to the contemporary Chinese society. In the western society, mass culture is not merely regarded as a kind of cultural life style dominated by culture industry, controlled for the commercial profit by cultural industry, and is often considered to be the cultural activity form set against with elite's culture and elegance culture. The western scholars hold the attitude of a kind of criticism to mass culture generally, among them regard criticism of the school of Frankfort as representatives particularly. The so-called " mass culture " of school of Frankfort, is the mass culture in the passive meaning, mainly refers in particular to depend on mass media technology, depend on living of the family and leisure, " culture mixed sweetmeat " that agitated the appreciation of art, politics , religious propaganda , philosophy idea and commercial profit , it is the mixtures of science and technology , economic base , ideology and cultural consumption, it is the important component or displaying the way in a totally new way of the modern capitalist commodity system. It has a partiality for the way concept and psychology of handling the masses of amusement with the leisure, cultivates and supports the consciousness of submitting to which rules, safeguards the current situation. Must is it say Frankfort society of school criticize theory point to the contemporary capitalist society mainly to come, it is a kind of culture to the developed industrial society in the west that is explained and criticized with culture. Undoubtedly, this kind of criticism is extremely deep, for us ,have reference function on analyzing contemporary Chinese mass culture scientifically. There are essential differences between Chinese mass culture and western mass culture. Chinese mass culture is after reform and opening-up, with the overall transition of the social structure of our country and brand-new culture phenomenon appearing in sound development of market economy, have extremely deep traditional culture inside information and extremely clear advanced cultural direction at the same time. According to Chinese great mission and essential request that Chinese culture develop of revival of nationhood, Chinese mass culture should be participated in and accepted voluntarily actively by most members of society of our country, have national characters ,accord with spirit of the times , rich science intension , for masses' culture life design loved by all, it must have a national characteristic , scientific and three major characteristics of popularization concurrently at the same time , must reflect it under the socialist market economy condition accurately , the practical experience of life and realizing in life of most members of Chinese society, meet the various demands for the culture life of the people to the greatest extent, and play a positive role to political democracy , economic development and culture prosperity of our country finally. But on the other hand, because contemporary mass culture of China begin to be right away influenced by western mass culture colonialism to sprout, in addition, of our country social cultural dynamics of member is it improve to demand urgently, advanced development and construction of the spiritual civilization of culture also face a series of problems and challenges, so, some unhealthy symptoms and troubling situation have appeared in contemporary Chinese mass culture, live a great deal of field take place passive negative function already , can't adopt a casual attitude already to potential harmfulness its in society, can't act with undue haste. Chinese mass culture, has already inherited Chinese nation's outstanding cultural tradition , infected with the bad habits and acquired characteristics of western mass culture too, thus make the behavior characteristic of Chinese mass culture have dual natures. On one hand, Chinese mass culture has front characteristics , such as national characteristic , science and popularization ,etc., on the other hand, negative characteristics , such as commerciality , level and homogeneity with western mass culture too ,etc., demonstrate a kind of mixing and contradiction on the whole. This text passes the folk culture to the ancient times with appearing in history of people's culture, the new culture of period of the May Fourth Movement , citizen of old Shanghai of 1930s culture, and the comparing vertically of culture form, such as revolutionary popular Volkswagen literature and art,etc. before and after founding the state, have announced that they are in the popular and masses inherent consistency of culture, reveal them in nature and enormous difference functionally too at the same time . Through compare to people's culture and national ideology culture , crosswise of culture , elite of intellectual, have announced the independent character of people's culture development. Elites of people's culture, national ideology culture, intellectual culture, they are as three kinds of different culture forms existing extensively in the present society of our country, have represented three kinds of different meanings and pointed to the cultural function different from three kinds separately, complement each other, restrict each other between the three, form whole pattern of socialist culture of our country together. Chinese mass culture is regarded as a whole important component of culture with Chinese characteristics, itself including national , scientific , mass value pursue , have positive social functions inside, play a positive role to political democracy , economic development and culture prosperity of our country; But at the same time , because receive the western adverse effect of colonizing the effect of mass culture, in addition, the cultural dynamics of social members of our country is limited, thus aggravated the negative effects in social life of Chinese mass culture ,either. In general terms, the social function of contemporary Chinese mass culture demonstrates the contradiction characteristic conflicting each other ,too: In economic field, Chinese mass culture encouraged the Mormonism behavior while bringing about an advance in productivity; In the political field, Chinese mass culture clears up national ideology too while promoting national democratic politics construction; In the field of culture, It has also connived at cultural hegemony while promoting culture to share . Setting up the mass culture with Chinese characteristics, must adhere to three major principles: That is nationality, scientific and popularization. So-called national characteristic, it is development of culture that should inherit and develop Chinese nation outstanding cultural tradition and revolutionary cultural tradition, make great efforts to reflect modern life styles of the people, modern mode of thinking, modern behavior standard , modern morals sentiment , modern aesthetic temperament and interest , modern to conduct oneself in society attitude and modern prevailing custom; Meanwhile, culture should meet the needs of the world , put the cultural development of our country in great background of world culture development, absorb the outstanding cultural quintessence of the various nationalities in the world, with the independent open psychology , reject all its dresses unfavorable to the human development, learn wildly from other's strong points , is used by me. In short, keep not only keep one's own national characters but also and other national equal interchange of culture, realize absorbing each other, common development. What is called scientific, it is development of culture that must insist on scientific spirit that seek truth from facts, insist that the unifying of the theory and practice, will not merely develop rich and colorful philosophy social science and various kinds of literature and art, also should develop the educational culture and science and technology in a more cost-effective manner , with feudalistic superstition ,struggle pseudoscience and moribund ideology and culture firmly, remove culture rubbish constantly, one that is for society overall to offer assurance of ideology and culture while being progressive. What is called popularization, it is construction and development of culture that must regard vastest the people as starting point and home order, make culture become reflection that the people build great practice of socialist modernization, serve the people, educational people, enjoyed by the people conversely, thus make the people improve one's own thought cultural dynamics and level of science and culture constantly, become the new generation of people with lofty ideals, moral integrity, good education and a strong sense of discipline. Make great efforts to guide the positive factor of mass culture, criticize its negative factor in a more cost-effective manner, the ones that criticized built the rational form of future which constructs the mass culture of implicit national characteristic, scientific and popular characteristic, it is the great subject for research that Chinese mass culture puts forward to us. This text put forward criticize is it construct people's culture with Chinese characteristics get some countermeasures out of to build tentatively. Countermeasures these are it build constructing from macroscopic and microcosmic two level to China people's culture rationally to launch. On the microscopically level, mainly strengthen the humanity to mass culture of elite's culture to promote. We can say, all drawbacks of mass culture, its lies in the disappearance of humane spirit a bit more thoroughly. Dispel all sorts of drawbacks of people's culture, set up the healthy and progressive people's culture with Chinese characteristics, must inject humane spirit into people's culture. Humane spirit human reason appearing in value, to assemble on whole human inherent soul of culture life, it regards pursuing to the lofty value ideal of truth, good and beauty as the core, regards people's own development in an all-round way as the ultimate purpose. Practice has proved carry on humane promotion of spirit to people's culture, to dispel people's culture effective way of drawback. On the micro level, rely on national guide and concrete legal norm and various kinds of cultural policies that country make of ideology strengthen the production to people's culture mainly, circulation, consume all basin manage and standardize. Through promote government norm in microcosmic to humanity of macroscopic, people's culture of China ,, dispel its negative factor as much as possible , really builds and constructs meeting most social member's culture life's needs and people's culture with Chinese characteristics, it will be a great social subject that will be showing especially constantly in field of practice and theory . This text just elementary to get several countermeasure out of, the social subject await further promotion research.

Title: Design of Marketing Framework for China PUTIAN Corporation
Abstract: CHINA PUTIAN CORPORATION(hereinafter called "CHINA PUTIAN") is an IT products and service provider in telecommunication industry. The company was founded in 1980, originally called China Posts and Telecommunications Industry Corporation. It is a state key enterprise directly under the leadership of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council (SASAC). The company owns CHINA PUTIAN Co., Ltd., which consists of 7 companies: PUTIAN Capitel, PUTIAN Eastcom, Ningbo Electronics, Beijing Ericsson PUTIAN, Nanjing Ericsson Panda, PUTIAN Taili, PUTIAN Designing & Planning Institute for Engineering. Besides that, CHINA PUTIAN also owns over 40 companies directly invested by the headquarters, which include 5 listed companies- Shanghai P&T, Chengdu Cable and Nanjing PUTIAN are directly invested by headquarters; PUTIAN Eastcom and Ningbo Bird are indirectly invested by headquarters. CHINA PUTIAN is a leading one among top 100 enterprises in China's IT industry, and ranked excessively the No. 1 of Top 100 Chinese Electronic & Information Enterprises in 2001 and 2002. In 2003, CHINA PUTIAN ranks No. 1 among the overall listing of China's largest enterprise groups in the manufacture sector of electronic and communication equipments. It ranks No. 5 both in the listings of 500 largest import & export and 200 largest export enterprises issued by the Ministry of Commerce of China. CHINA PUTIAN's business scope covers both fixed and mobile communications. Its available communication equipments and terminal products include: mobile communication network equipments and handsets, optical transmission equipments and communication cables, PDF and connectors, power supplies, microwave communication equipments, telecommunication network Operation Support Systems (OSS), SPC switch, videophones and IC card payphones, PHS handsets, logistics information system and equipments for industries, ITS series products, office information equipments and etc, as well as project contracting home and abroad, international cooperation, technology transfer, products import and export and etc. Since it was born under the planned economy, China Putian gets many serious problem with its marketing framework, such as branches overlapped, overstaffed, half and unclear assignment, faulty merit system, lay much more emphasis upon sales than marketing. CHINA PUTIAN's marketing network includes two networks of market development and after-sales service, which has about 700 relative offices covering almost all the areas above county level in China. CHINA PUTIAN has established 8 representative offices in Beijing, Shenyang, Nanjing, Hangzhou, Wuhan, Guangzhou, Chengdu, and Xi'an. China Putian equips its framework with the marketing department, but the department puts its all force into market scheme and distribution. It’s vague and general, far from real market, unresponsive to the marketing information, lack of essential effort towards marketing. China Putian has a group of subsidiaries who do the market in their own way, and it is lack of management and development over the whole holding market. This seriously stunts China Putian’s growth. In the fast developing industry, China Putian must find a way suitable for itself and went along with the developing direction of the industry. Telecommunication industry will be the largest industry in the world of 21th century, it is the base of modern economy and leader of society development. At the same time, the industry needs knowledge and technique, and provides high percentage of social employment. It can be a continuously developing industry, with low input and high efficiency. But it also hides with high risk, high competition and high investment. In China, telecommunication industry has its own specific character. Considering both the practice of China Putian and the specialty of the industry, the thesis designs a whole framework of marketing for China Putian. It first expatiates the differences between sales and marketing, and the importance of marketing, also introduces the successful experiences of corporations in the industry to set out the importance and bright future for the marketing of China Putian. It has significant influence to set out a suitable marketing framework in a corporation. A corporation’s living base is marketing. So marketing should be given highest attention throughout the corporation, from investment planning, personnel training to the setting up of an effective marketing framework. Thus, China Putian will have an overall marketing structure. The thesis gives a design of marketing frame for China Putian, considering its own features. The marketing frame is formed of seven functional parts. They are government department, align department, partner department, sales communicating department, product developing department, international market developing department and promoting department. The thesis lists their organic system, ruling extension and duties. The departments set up due to different courses: Government department: as a state-owned corporation, China Putian’s products and services may be greatly influenced by government’s policies. It is very important to the corporation to remain good relationship with the government. Being the practicer and witness of the rapid growth of Chinese IT industry at all times, CHINA PUTIAN and its subsidiaries have attracted great attention from national Communist Party of China (CPC) and government leaders. Those leaders' sincere concern and support can be found in the development history of CHINA PUTIAN. Align department: its main assignment are to absorb right personnel, to supplement each other with resources in the industry, to gain a better and healthier environment for the development of the corporation, to promote the develop of the whole industry to gain the scale economy. Under the new market mechanism and the support of friends from all walks of life, CHINA PUTIAN will establish good cooperation relationships with all major telecommunication carriers in China by resorting to its own technical merit and industrial capacity. Partner department: it’s a channel cleaner between the corporation and final market, to make the channel expedite and healthy, to organize its affiliated enterprises to undertake important projects of constructing state public and private networks and to provide total solutions for manufacture, design, installation, test, etc. It is important to set up an information-sharing channel for innovators and potential partners working in academia or the business world, aiming to promote cooperation. Now our country is facing a strategic period and it's also a vital one for the development of IT industry. CHINA PUTIAN should cooperate with the partner in and out of the industry, to meet government's requirements, carry out reforms proactively, strengthen the integration of group resource, enhance competence and manage to create values for clients, so as to become better, stronger and more stable, and make greater contributions to China's IT industry. Product developing department: it is a vanguard of the corporation’s R&D towards the market demands, and finds new way of developing market, to widen the business of the corporation. CHINA PUTIAN promotes technical innovation and continually consolidats its R&D on telecom technologies and products with its independent intellectual property right. CHINA PUTIAN R&D System includes central research institute and its branches. In November 2001, CHINA PUTIAN set up its central research institute-CHINA PUTIAN Institute of Technology and later four branches in Capitel, Eastcom, Runway, and Smartcomm in succession. This central research institute is responsible for the comprehensive management and planning of over 80 PUTIAN's research institutions. In July 2003, CHINA PUTIAN Institute of Technology (Shanghai) was formally in operation. It will provide mobile phone chipset and RF module with own core technologies for PUTIAN Group and deepen terminal R&D in core level. Promotion department: modern marketing strategy aims much more on the reputation of the corporation by have promotion activities toward products related with the looks, characters, purchasing issues and benefits to the customers, etc. And of course all of these promotion should be based on the right products for the aimed customers, in all the aspects of meeting the needs of final customers, went along with the fashion, the trend of the social developing, and pricing attractively. To do the promotion, CHINA PUTIAN shall also contribute its efforts to commonweal affairs to maintain good reputation of the corporation among common people who are also the potential customers, and it has done so gradually. Its donation built a Wazijie Project Hope School in Huanglong County of Shaanxi Province. It donated mobile phones of its own brand to model workers from China's western area. It donated relieving fund to the "Care for the West, Share One Love" movement. It signed assistance agreements with 2 poverty-stricken counties-Dari and Gande, in Guoluo Prefecture of Qinghai Province. It donated money and material to Anti-SARS related organization. International marketing department: CHINA PUTIAN is keen on developing international markets. Through joint venture, cooperation, and compensation trade, CHINA PUTIAN has established over 90 joint venture companies with 47 companies including world-renowned telecommunication manufacturers from 19 countries and regions. CHINA PUTIAN enjoys long-term strategic partnership with world-renowned telecommunication manufacturers such as Ericsson, Nokia, Panasonic, Motorola, Alcatel, Toshiba, Sanyo, Lucent, NEC, Corning, Nortel, TI, Tellabs, etc. In 2003, the company's total import and export volume is US$ 4.63 billion. Its export volume is US$ 2.16 billion. Its products are sold in dozens of countries and regions such as the U.S., Japan, Finland, Sweden, the U.K., Turkey, United Arab Emirates, India, Nepal, Indonesia, South Africa, Nigeria, Cuba, Columbia and etc. So it is an important part for corporation’s development that to communicate and cooperate with the industry members global wide. PUTIAN should also pay greater attention and resources on cooperation with foreign companies. It is committed to expanding its business scope into promising new areas in communications solutions, products and services at home and aboard. Sales department: it is the final step of marketing, which is a point to verify the effects of the work of marketing. The thesis emphasizes on the functions, extension and merit system of these seven parts, and gives living cases to support the design. These cases illustrate different aspects of the marketing function. The functional departments are not working independently, but connecting a lot. In this way, China Putian’s developing strategy can be laid down to the detailed assignments of marketing. At the same time, the various problems and information can be fed back and solved in time, so that, the strategy itself can be supplemented and corrected. The thesis demonstrates the significance of after-sales services. The holding of customers largely relies on the quality of after-sales services, it’s also a course of gaining goodwill for the organization, so after-sales service is an important and complex function. The thesis also discusses the merit system of after-sales service function, and illustrates the merit system of customer-service department of China Putian Hexin Network Communication Technique Corporation to make it practical to China Putian. The thesis then emphasizes on what should be noticed during the setting up of the framework, like the problem of communication hindrances. The marketing framework will have large investment of the resources, and what’s more, may not get immediate effects. So the leading members of China Putian have to voluntarily demonstrate the importance of the framework, and push forward the work of setting up the framework. Marketing function is the most disputed one among all the functions in the corporation, and the decisions makers are rectify their attitudes towards marketing stage by stage. At first, marketing function is just like other functions of personnel, finance, manufacture, afterwards, going along with the development of the corporation, people gradually realize the importance of marketing, and think it should be more important than other functions, and even the core function of the corporation. No marketing, no corporation. Other people regard that customers are the core of the corporation’s living, marketing is the channel connecting the corporation and the customers. And the regards have been believed throughout the world. But in China’s corporations, there is no way to believe marketing as the core of living, include China Putian. China Putian pays much attention on the volume of sales, on the time of payback. Marketing is just so-so, no one is ready to think high of the marketing function. From the view of the ready marketing framework of China Putian, the subordinate functions are set up according to the assignments of the strategy, some of the assignments are rather duplicated, so it makes cooperation much important. But smooth cooperation is rather difficult to get, it needs a common interest among the subordinate functions. The thesis tries to exercise the marketing theories to analyze the sticking point in the marketing function of China Putian, and finally tries to find a way for it.

Title: A Comprehensive Study of the Development of the CPC's Democratic Thoughts
Abstract: Before the foundation of the Communist Party of China (hereinafter CPC) the Chinese democratic revolution has been occurred. The Chinese revolution has been continued for several decades before CPC has become the major revolution force in Chinese political arena. The Revolution under the leadership of CPC has been the continuation of the Chinese democratic revolution indeed. Therefore, the following characteristic background for the foundation of CPC goes as: firstly, its long period of living in isolation and its serious political corruption have caused the under development of Chinese economy and thus the level of the productive forces for the development of democracy in China is kept really low; secondly, the invasion of the Imperial Powers has robbed China of its sovereignty as well as the independence of the Chinese nation; thirdly, the 1911 Revolution (Xinhaigemin) has overthrew the rule of the Qing Dynasty and established the Republic of China, but the newly born Republic of China headed by Jiang Jieshi later has turned into the regime of big landlords and bourgeoisie. It has not paved the way for the development of Chinese National Capitalism, but threw itself into the lap of Imperial Powers to suppress the development of Chinese National Capitalism. The nature of its Class has determined itself to fail to set down the right policy for the classes and politics in China so as to complete an effective political conformity of the Chinese society. Therefore, after the establishment of the Republic of China, the whole country still remains disintegrated, and the Chinese people still live an extremely poor life, let alone their independence and democratic rights in China. In 1917, the October Revolution in Russia won its victory and then it has brought Marxism into China. With its revolutionary and scientific and practical features, the Marxism has been accepted by the progressive intellectuals in China, therefore, CPC has come into being which has been the product of the combination of Marxism and Chinese revolutionary practices. Since its foundation, CPC has been guided by the Marxist proletariat revolutionary thoughts and struggled for the ideal of Communism. CPC has worked out the proletariat revolutionary strategy, adopted the democratic principles of Marxism, established the Marxist Party and Army and led Chinese people to carry on the democratic revolution in China. During the Chinese revolution, with the combination of democratic thoughts of Marxism and the revolutionary practice in China led by CPC, the CPC democratic thoughts have come into being. Thereafter the CPC democratic thoughts have been developing. This dissertation aims at making a comprehensive study of the CPC democratic thoughts in six chapters. Chapter one has discussed the establishment of CPC democratic thoughts. The CPC democratic thoughts set the Marxist democratic thoughts as its core with the background of particular Chinese revolution and rich Chinese Civilization. Therefore, the establishment of CPC democratic thoughts have been influenced by the following three forces: Marxist democratic thoughts, capitalist democratic thoughts, and the Chinese traditional thoughts such as “human-oriented and rule of virtue”. Since the establishment of the CPC democratic thoughts have come into being in the course of democratic revolution, it has presented itself with two features: adopting to conditions of Chinese revolution and responding to the task of the time. During the 1920s and 1930s, China has remained as no independence to the outside and no sovereignty inside, its people has lived in extremely poverty. Just like the famous scholar in Peking University, Prof. Guan Haiting pointed out in his writing, The Review of History of 20th Century Chinese Political Development, as to the Chinese people living in such a poor life, democracy has become a real luxury in their life, the first thing to do for the Chinese people at that time should be conducting the revolution to save the nation in peril, therefore, the Chinese democratic movement often serves as the tool to save the nation in peril and it remains not as its aim at all. That is why we can say that the CPC democratic thoughts have the revolutionary feature from its very beginning. The CPC democratic thoughts has developed with the focus of conducting Chinese revolution and taking the regime for the revolution, and with its aim of capturing the victory of the revolution in China and establishing of the new democratic state. Therefore the CPC democratic thoughts have been embodied as the concrete revolutionary strategy and tactics, such as “the mass line” and “united front”. As to the periods of establishment and development of the CPC democratic thoughts, the period from the foundation of CPC to the victory of new democratic revolution is the most important period for the primary establishment of the CPC democratic thoughts. Chapter two has talked about the development of the CPC democratic thoughts. Before the foundation of the People’s Republic of China, what kind of state-ship and government should be established in China has become an urgent task for CPC. At that time, guided by Marxist thought of Proletariat dictatorship and based on the practical condition of China, the CPC has creatively brought forward the People’s democratic dictatorship which guided the new China to establish the state-ship of the People’s democratic dictatorship and its basic democratic system, and has pave the way for the socialist democratic system in the way of government guarantee. In addition, CPC has guided Chinese people to pass the first basic law, namely, the Constitution in China in 1954. The Constitution has stipulated the state system of the People’s democratic dictatorship in China, the system of government of people’s congress, the basic democratic system of multi –nationality, the system of multi-party co-operation and democratic supervision, and democracy at basic levels. It has also regulated people’s basic democratic rights which has embodied the CPC democracy and democratic legal system thoughts. At the same time, CPC has led people to conduct the economic building and set the first five-year plan and the target of industrial development which has lain a solid base for the establishment of the socialist democratic system and embodied the CPC thought that the productive forces is the base for development of democracy. After foundation of People’s Republic of China (PRC), the state system of People’s democratic dictatorship is of the new democracy. During that period, the public ownership as the dominated position in the national economy has not established, and there are also five kinds of economic forces in the country’s economy which are not of the socialism. Guided by the ideal of the socialist democracy, CPC has renewed national economy and put forward their transition towards the socialist economy. CPC has regulated this transition into the Constitution which is the embodiment of CPC’s building of socialist democracy in China. The transition towards the socialist economy, the CPC democratic thoughts has also developed into the socialist democratic thoughts. After “the Three Great Remould” movements, namely, movements of socialist transformation of agriculture, handicrafts and capitalist industry and commerce, China has established the socialist democracy system and pushed the development of the CPC democratic thoughts into that of the Socialist democracy thoughts. This period has been the period of establishing and developing of CPC socialist democracy and legal system thoughts with its focus of creation of people’s democratic dictatorship, transition towards the socialism, paving the way for building of socialism and making perfect the legal system. Chapter three has focused on the ups and downs of the CPC democratic thoughts. After the completion of “the Three Great Remould” movements, the new system of socialism has been established in China. The development of Chinese democracy and that of the CPC democratic thoughts both have been based on the socialism thereafter. Before and after “the 8th CPC National Congress”, the CPC has made a lot of exploration in the way of how to improve and develop the socialist democracy. The CPC has found more problems and studied more issues. For example,, Mr. Mao Zedong has discussed how to balance the relation between the central government and the local government in his On the Ten Major Relations and on its related discussions. In the field of scientific work, the CPC has adopted the guideline of “letting a hundred flowers blossom and a hundred schools of thought contend”, developed a policy of “long-term co-existence and mutual supervision” with other democratic parties, and formed the thought of “handling correctly the contradictions among the people” and so on. During September 15-27, 1956, the 8th CPC National Congress was held in Beijing which was held with the background of the victory of the socialism and the realization of its fundamental change of social conditions in China. The congress has reflected the status of the every social class and Chinese changes in their political, cultural and economic senses. The congress has summed up the experiences of the People’s democratic dictatorship as well as of constructing the newly socialist democracy. More importantly, the congress was held after the 20th National Congress of Communist Party of the Soviet Union and has discussed the malpractice of the Soviet Union Mode and stressed the issue of the development of democracy and brought forward many thoughts and strategies of constructing the socialist democracy. But due to the pressing economic development and the threat from the international capitalism, due to the unilateralism of developing the economy and due to the influence of the malpractice of the Soviet Union Mode, the “Left” mistakes have occurred in the CPC and the thoughts of the 8th National Congress has been given up in the practice of socialist construction. During the transformation to the socialist construction, the development of the CPC democratic thoughts has been misled and the “Left” thought in CPC has been spread unchecked and prevented the development of the socialist democracy and led to the happening of the tragedy of “Cultural Revolution”. Chapter four has stressed the recovery and the development of the CPC democratic thoughts. The opening of 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th National Congress of the CPC has indicated the ending of the “Left” errors in CPC. The 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th National Congress of the CPC has resumed the Marxist thought line of “seeking truth from the facts” and renewed the correct thought of how to develop the socialist democratic thoughts around the 8th National Congress of CPC. During the correction of the “Left” errors, CPC has set forth the Four Fundamental Principles (the socialist road, the People’s democratic dictatorship, Marxist-Leninism and Mao Zedong Thoughts and the leadership of the CPC) which guide the construction of the socialist democracy. Along the correct guideline of “seeking the truth from facts”, the CPC has set forth the thoughts of reforming system. As to the economic system, the CPC has brought forward the central task of the economic construction and come back to the road of Marxist idea that “the productive forces have been the base for the development of democracy. Constructing the socialist democracy must be needed to enhance the construction of the legal system and democratic system, and make the democratic system institutionalized and legalized so that to meet the requirement of extending democracy and of constructing the socialist modernization. The CPC has brought forth the thought of reforming the system of cadre leadership which starts to the prologue of reforming the political system. Chapter five has detailed the comprehensive development of the CPC democratic thoughts. On the 12th National Congress of CPC, the CPC has stated the importance of developing democracy from the overall situation of constructing the socialist modernization. The CPC headed By Mr. Deng Xiaoping has changed the modernization development strategy from its unilateralism of developing the economy into the comprehensive one, in other words, modernization in China means not only the modernization of economy, but also the modernization of politics and culture. The CPC has also set forth the task of building our great motherland into a strong, prosperous, democratic and culturally advanced modern socialist country. Thereafter the CPC democratic thoughts has finally shook off from its thinking of revolution and stepped into the suitable track of developing the socialist democracy in China, set out the strategy of comprehensive development of the society and has made the democracy as one of the developing target of the whole development of the society. The reforming of the political system has officially brought forward only after the primary success of the economic reforming. With the deepening economic system reform, the former political system has not met the development of economy. In order to liberate the productive forces and shake off the bondage of related superstructure, the 13th National Congress of CPC has stressed the thought of reforming the political system. On the 13th National Congress of CPC, the CPC has stated the thought of reforming the political system in a comprehensive way which is the further advance in developing the CPC democratic thoughts. With the further development of reforming and opening-up, the CPC has continued its exploration in developing the socialism and later the CPC has developed the theory that China was in the primary stage of socialism and the thought of the socialist commodity economy and further developed into forming the new theory of building socialism with Chinese characteristics. Among which building the socialist democratic thoughts with Chinese characteristics has become the advancement of the CPC democratic thoughts. With the guideline of building the socialist democratic thoughts with Chinese characteristics, the CPC has formed its reform thought of political system with the base of “adhering to and improving the socialist democracy system” in its practice of political reforms. With the advancement in legal system construction and publication of democracy, the CPC has developed into the thought of “ruling with law and constructing the socialist legal country”. After the successes in reforms in economic and political systems and with the start of building a well-off society in an all-round way, the CPC has pointed out the new thought of development of political civilization as its democratic thoughts. The development of political civilization has come into being with the development of the times and it is the requirement for the CPC to build a well-off society in an all-round way and it is also the advancement of CPC democratic thoughts. In terms of its contents, the development of the CPC democratic thoughts has been centered on how to reform and improve the basic system of the socialism, and the development stage is its mature period for the CPC democratic thoughts. Chapter six has summed up the path and characteristics of the CPC democratic thoughts. The development of the CPC democratic thoughts has been influenced by many factors, such as social conditions for the economy, people’s education level, people’s knowledge of law, and democratic practice. It is clear that the CPC democratic thoughts have been a combination of many factors. With the influence of these factors, the CPC democratic thoughts have gained their characteristics: people’s democratic dictatorship, socialism, adaptation to the revolution and construction, keeping on developing and so on. In general, the various stages of the CPC democratic thoughts have indicated a progressive course in which the latter stage has advanced with the base of the former. From the revolution period to the socialist construction period, the CPC democratic thoughts have adapted to the requirement of revolution first and then of socialist construction, and experienced the following stages: from the democratic thoughts of the revolutionary party to that of the party in power, from its stress on seizing the victory of the revolution and creating new system to stressing the socialist systematic construction and legal development, from its stressing that democracy should be submitted to the needs of revolution and economic construction to the idea that the democracy construction has become the important part of collective targets of socialist construction. In the part of conclusion, this dissertation has stressed again that the CPC democratic thoughts have been guided by the ideal of communism and developed with the direction of socialist democratic practice, in other words, the CPC democratic thoughts have developed with the direction of communist ideal and also with the direction of socialist practice which reflects that the basic law of Chinese Socialist democracy development led by the CPC, namely, from its ideal to its practice, and again from its practice to its ideal. Therefore, not only from the viewpoint of the CPC democratic thoughts, but also from the practice guided by the CPC democratic thoughts, the ideal is not far from us, our theory could give us strong motivation an push us forwards our ideal; as long as we strive for our ideal with heart and soul, we human beings could step into the glorious future of Communism.

Title: Studies on biological invasion by Eupatorium adenophorum
Abstract: Biological invasion has brought about serious loss to social and economic development and exerted heavy impacts on biodiversity, which received great concern in international community. The mechanism for the invasion is the key scientific issue among others. In the paper, we examined the biological, ecological traits and changing in allelopathy of croften weed (Eupatorium adenophorum), and alteration of the soil properties in different habitats to describe the special properties of invasive plants and seek the mechanisms of invader success. Our results indicated that the dominating traits and ecological strategy of E. adenophorum population were different in habitats. Evergreen broadleaved forest is a stress habitat for E.. adenophorum, and it exhibited r- strategy. However, in optimum deciduous broadleaved forest, the E. adenophorum population preferred k- strategy. In stress habitat, the growth of adult individual of E. adenophorum was limited by the resource as light, and with low ability for absorbing and depositing the nutrient, thus they could not produce more clonal individual that need more energy; But in optimum habitat, the adult individual of E. adenophorum grew strongly due to high ability for absorbing and depositing the nutrient, thus they could produce more clonal offsprings. In stress habitats, small numbers of weak adult individuals of the invader played a minor role on the seedling banks; and the populations made good use of the heterogeneous resources by using their abundant seed source. In contrast, in optimum habitat densely and boomingly growing individuals greatly influenced the seedlings resulting in low survival rate of seedlings, the population competed effectively for resources by its abundant clonal seedlings with high growth and competitive features. These two ecological strategies could transform to each other at space and time and facilitate E. adenophorum to establish in extensive habitats. The reproductive characteristics of invasive plants correlate with their invasive ability. For A. adenophorum, populations may reproduce by seed or clonally, its most seedlings occurring in evergreen broadleaved forest, and its many more clonal plants occurring in deciduous broadleaved forest and roadside sites. The litter covering at the soil surface only reduces seedling abundance in the seedling emergence period, and that does not influence the seedling growth after emergence period. The growth and distributing pattern of adult E. adenophorum in different habitat dominated the patterns of A. adenophorum reproduction. In evergreen broadleaved forest, parental plants were sparse and grew weakly, thus the survival rate of seedlings was high. In contrast, in deciduous broadleaved forest and roadside, the parents grew strongly and abundant, thus the survival rate of seedlings was low. That may be because adult A. adenophorum compete strongly for resources (such as nutrient and water) or because such mature plants are toxic to seedlings. The diffusion of A. adenophorum from its original region in Central America to Australia, Africa, Asia and so forth by human movement; Furthermore, the spread of this plant from an ecosystem or habitat to other new ecosystem or habitat could be by seed, via wind, water, or animal-borne transport. Finally, at infested sites, A. adenophorum populations may primarily reproduce and come to dominate a site by clonal reproduction. In evergreen broadleaved forest, the plants rely on seed dispersal to maintain populations in such habitats. In contrast, clonal plants grow quickly and compete strongly; contributing to the creation of monospecific stands particularly may present a substantial barrier to the restoration of natural community in deciduous broadleaved forest and roadside. Allelopathy explained a part of the invasiveness of E. adenophorum. The allelopathy of roots and stems of E. adenophorum were significant difference between habitats. This allelopathy of roots or stems was strong in optimum habitat, however that was weak in stress habitat; the result was significantly related to the abundances of native plants in habitats, showing that the difference of allelopathy in E. adenophorum results in different invasiveness of E. adenophorum between habitats. In optimum habitats, E. adenophorum grown strongly and abundantly, thus they could produce much more allelopathicsubstance in unit area than those grown in stress habitats, which might compel the native plants into more competition pressure and accelerated the natural vegetation declining in the habitat. The properties of soil from E. adenophorum heavily invaded habitat were significantly altered; the content of available N, P, K in heavily invaded habitat were all greatly enhanced than in lightly invaded; and the functional structure of soil microbe community was altered too, the catabolic activity of the soil microbe community at acids was significantly greater, and that at glucide or hydroxyketone was significantly low in heavily invaded habitat than those in lightly invaded. The invasive species might destroy the closely coupled soil-plant communities that developed over time by changing the soil microbial community, and successfully invaded the habitat by inhibiting the growth and regeneration of native plant species. The restoration of the soil microbial community in invaded habitats might be long-term and difficult process. This may be a formidable obstacle to overcome for controlling invasive plants and restoring the vegetation in agricultural and natural ecosystems. Thus, single reason, such as physiological or chemical characteristics of invasive plant, is limited and failed to provide adequate explanations of invader success. A holistic perspective that considers the whole system and the interactions among the components will be a more fruitful approach to understanding invasive ecology. A knowledge of how the invading species replaces the native species is probably the key to the effective management and soil restoration strategies.
