Title: The Macroscopic Analysis of Chinese fictitious Economy
Abstract: Since 80's in 20century, the total financial property of the western and main industrial country and the ratio of the GDP have raised quickly. Because give up gold standard currency is thoroughly fictitious to have already turn behind, the financial property inflated many nations to exceed actual GDP quickly 100% above;The contact of the international was increasingly close, usually the item receipt and expenditure and the capital item receipt and expenditure have already had very big ratio of its GDP.This kind of economy that outruns real economy to enlarge continuously has obvious fictitious , need to use the concept of the fictitious economy thus to it to carry on a research. The finance is more and more important in the modern society, almost becoming the motive source and core of the modern economy, also it is the weak link of development in the perfecting socialism market economy system in China.Be economic to the fictitious of grind Investigate, turn the research and quest of the process to the capital fictitious especially, can provide the operation guide for the contemporary and financial innovation.Study a financial problem from the angle of the fictitious economy, can obtain a kind of more spacious of range of experience, turn deeply with financial system reform to put forward a beneficial suggestion to the finance of China. The quick development of financial liberalism in world, the financial innovation appears continuously, nations of the monetary policy,rate of exchange system,portfolio,crisis management policies all will take place to the realistic economy to influence very greatly, to macro-economy the management put forward a very high request, thus request to have correspond of the policy design and the system thinking. Industrialize a stage after acrossing in succession into along with the flourishing capitalism nation, the economic globalization,capital flows liberalism to make the huge financial capital become a kind of strength of independence in the world, developping its wealth to create the decision intelligence function and carefully evadable its huge impact risk will test the layers of macroeconomics management availably, also providing to the researchers good choose. Fictitious economy conduct and actions is a theories system that is becoming, holding it with accuracy,is contributed to the confidence of the whole modern economic system and comprehending it.Appear that the global economic discharge flow,the property price exist at any time under indetermination circumstance, the pulse that holds economic movement already can't the light seeing actual GDP of how much, or the size of the actual product yield, also need to see a funds fly to with the discharge, sees the motion,variety that the social value measure and distribute. The fictitious economy is a total amount problem, but needs to have numerous weight conduct and actions to prop up in the meantime, because this is at home and abroad all the problem in continuously thorough research, a lot of defines exist faintness, this text turns deeply by finance be an important background with economic globalization, lay particular emphasis on to launch a research from the economic efficiency and the angle of economic safe, these researches all have a great deal of theories and substantial evidence to study a result at home and abroad, this text carried on having selectivity to these researches of drawing lessons from, hope to be logical in all aspects to keep consistently break, this kind of integration and creative work still need to be go into it deeply. The thesis hopes to have a clear but right of confidence to the Chinese fictitious economic of the development grain, and turn progress to have a substantial evidence to the fictitious of the Chinese economy of analysis, this work return is not enough perfect.Collected aspect to do a more work in the data, consider the clues of the international horizontal comparison and the history development, and carried on theories to generalize, but studied the application of the tool is still rougher, some conclusions still need a further verification. The thesis put forward according to China in carrying on the foundation of the research to the development of the Chinese fictitious economy in the way of thinking of the state of the nation. The research expresses the fictitious economy meaning of existence and development lies in its leading to real economy and promote a function, the fictitious economy is an economic system to arrange, the economy that contributes to becoming a kind of market to turn encourages a mechanism, guiding a resources to carry on excellent turn to install, end promote the industry grow up to develop real economy. The structure arrangement and text of this summary, cent the general introduction part and text eight chapter, general introduction part, put forward the background and reason of the research, to tell why put forward the concept of the fictitious economy, fictitious economy of the reality express and evolve the logic carry on introduction and comment on, pointing out the theories and realistic meaning that studies to this problem, and do elucidation to the frame of the research and the method of the usage.The part of the rest discusses one by one in order as follow problems:(I)The fictitious economic theories progress research;(II)The general outline of the fictitious economy definition;(III)Chinese formation mechanism of the fictitious economy; ( IV)The development progress of the Chinese fictitious economy; (V)The relation between fictitious economy and real economy in China;(VI)The condition that the Chinese fictitious economy develops healthily;(VII)The boundary of the Chinese fictitious economic development; (VIII) The fictitious economic angle of Chinese macroscopic economy evaluation and Adjustion . І.The Fictitious Economic Theories Research This chapter carried on introduction and comment on to the fictitious economic theories progress, separateing the abroad and domestic in two clueses. Put forward the concept of the fictitious capital at the earliest stage and carried on to go deep into analytical was a mark to think. Karl Marx ,he put forward the realistic capital and fictitious capital, this to the concept in 《Capital Theory 》 Volume 3. Marx thought of this the research was pushed forward to of the separation of produce sport and the property sport by Rudoff Hilferding.And Thorstein Veblen, the coetaneous with Rudoff Hilferding , studied the difference of the industrial capital and the financial capital, announced the characteristics with mental influence to the market that the financial capital to be subjected.John Maynard Keynes pushed forward the research of Thorstein Veblen, valuing the function of the finance more. Peter F.Drucker put forward the concepts of the sign economy and real economy further, thought the contemporary sign economy had already replaced the real economy that had becomed flywheel of the world economy. At the monetary function aspect, in the theories of the development of the process, the standpoint of the earlier period thought that the merchandise always was purchased by merchandise, the currency had the momentary commutation medium function, be called a dichotomy method. The 20 centuries in the first and the half leaf of, John Maynard Keynes in the aspects of blending the worth theories and the currency theories(1936), Oscar Lange in the space of blending the generally balanced axiology and the currency theories (1944) were to do to contribute. Half after 20 century leaf, the currency theories had a further development with the fusion of the generally economic theories.D.Patinkin put forward the effect concept of actual surplus amount (1965), the actual surplus amount of the currency will influence the merchandise need and the price of the real object part, making the absolute price become a quantity that supplies and all markets to make sure with need in the meantime. Modigliani(1958) in the foundation of inside currency and the outside currency , analyzed the currency further respectively from the bank currency, government currency and mix currency to act as the function process of the wealth effected under circumstance.Milton Friedman (1963) ,Jamas Tobin (1982) further perfect this study. John Muth (1961) put forward the reasonableness expectation concept, Black and others (1986) put forward the model of noise traders that research the formation mechanism of the property foam. Relate to aspect in the fictitious economy and the real economy.Bagehot(1873) carried on a research of the capital flowed function to industrialize England especially in early days. Later of world war two, John G. Gurley and Edward S.Shaw(1960),Hugh T.Patrick,Raymond W.Goldsmith, and etc. They thought , the development of finance promoted the capital save in increment of the quantity, causing to produce physically of growth.70's in 20 centuries ,McKinnon and Edward S.Shaw(1973) put forward the theories of finance to repress-the the finance turns deepening.Appeared in 80's for 20 centuries inside living the finance growth theories and appear a great deal of experience and substantial evidence research. The domestic in fictitious economics of the research also has a lot of scholars.CHEN Si-wei in the foundation of Marx fictitious capital ,did the investigation to the quick development of the fictitious economy at whole world. LIU Jun-min studied the relations between fictitious economy and real economy, think fictitious economy is a market economy alignment in maturity of marking.LI Chong studied from the real object economy toward the currency economy again to finance economy of conversion mechanism.YAO Xian-guo,etc. analyzed China to turn the variety of the financial system in the track process.WANG Ai-jian then analyzed the influence of the financial innovation upon the Chinese fictitious economic development.In addition, some scholars enriched Chinese fictitious economy in the research of the angles of its professional research.LI Yang analyzed the function of the financial globalization, CHEN Liu-qin analyzed financial influence of the innovation upon the monetary policy, CHEN Yong-qin and others researchde the financial property foam problem, XIE Pin , YI Gun and others studied the results of the bank to the function of the real economy, LIU Dong and others analyzed the relation between fictitious economy and real economy, ZHANG Xiao Jing in the angle of history analyzed the currency,stock certificate and finance to develop the emergence of the tool. ІІ.The General Concept of the Fictitious Economy Definition The fictitious economy is in the currency deeply turn the process, the capital takes propagate as a purpose but carries on of turning independently The athletic rights trade, mainly is under the sistuation that the reputation system is compare to develop greatly the economic or financial activity escape from or deviate real economy and obtain an opposite and independent sport form of that part of economy.But the real economy then produce the product that can increase mankind's use value,effect and welfare or serves for it of economic activities is the production and the service activity that the material produces a section.The essence characteristic or content of the fictitious economy are the movement for national independences that the capital is worth appearance, it without resort to produce kimono to attend to fundamentals a body to create the use value and the realization value, but passes the particular rule and form, seeking by oneself increase in value of the capital, "spend money to earn money", but exist with real economy again in the meantime extremely close of according to save a relation. The fictitious economy as the form of the independence circulates from real economy in the product and the service of the sport,foreign exchange of the capital , the fluxion of the reputation, can also be called the sign economy, its expressing appearance excessively is a bubble economy.Stock,bond, etc., the stock certificate turn property,futures,option...etc., are the main forms of fictitious economy existing .Ground price of the estate industry becoming and the the collecting industry,gaming industry , also have the parts of the characteristicses of the fictitious economy, but don't belong to fictitious economy. The creation of the fictitious economy relies on certain development,such as social division degree of labour turn deeply in the real economy,popularization of the currency usage, sound of social reputation system, complete legal system, convenience of the information obtain , the progress of trade with technique and means.The economic globalization,the information technique revolution and finance turned innovation to raise the efficiency of the economic activities and the risk of the motion deeply, strengthenning thus a management to the risk of request, pushed to having the risk management moderate to transfer function of fictitious economy the development. The fictitious economy is opposite with real economy should of theories category, is the modern form that the fictitious capital circulate, is the financial activity that has relation with fictitious capital sport, is the currency that the fictitious capital and fictitious turn combines together ,become of the opposite independence deciding the process and opposite and independent movement process in the price of the fictitious capital of the real economy.The fictitious capital has characters of independence,setting,development,expecting,risk(indetermination),liquidity,vivid,international etc., having thus a comprehensive characteristic as follows:(1)Take the entity capital as to rely on and separate with the entity capital;(2)Belong to a financial property;(3)Have the surplus obtains power;(4)Can have much heavy with the existence(fictitious) of many times;(5)Can circulate freely.With make money for purpose of the fictitious capital is the movement corpus of the fictitious economy, its natural character is to want in the sport to seek value to increase in value.The fictitious economy escapes from real economy to combine is a fictitious by being worth the appearance movement for national independence economic fictitious attribute the most basic body .It is constituted the actual contents of the fictitious economy by the economic total amount and economic behavior that the fictitious capital sport become. I think, can put great emphasis on its manifestation and circulate a way to the observation of a kind of economic appearance, the fictitious economy is an opposite real economy but speech of, fictitious economy because of super take off in the real object form of the economic movement, as a result have obviously of to real economy of according to saves the idea that characters,price prop up,circulate the motion,reflection of the appearance to expect of the standard,fictitious degree for running before the fast,rule,total amount variety to request pass to increase,crisis to appear suddenly,economic result of overall. I approve the dividing by Mr.CHEN Si-wie,but belive that the history of fictitious economy can be divided into six stages: 16 centuries the initial the stage to the economic crisis of British in 1825,the embryonic stage;the British economic crisis in 1825 to the economic crisis in world in 1929,the fictitious capital development of the industrial ages;the great crisis went to the Bretton Woods System to disintegrate in 1973 ,took charge of and divided strictly US$ ages of camp;1973-1990 years,the financial liberalism and financial creative period;1990-2000 years,the financial globalization develops greatly, the finance motion strengthen period; later in 2000 years,the Euro currency is rising.Fictitious economy conduct and actions depends on to save the economic appearance that gets up in the real economy development, it is initial and should be the development condition of the real economy with basic decision factor, the structure and scale of the real economy come to a decision the structure and the scale of the fictitious economy.In the meantime, the fictitious economy is the worth system that a kind of idea prop up, its price isn't decide by the inside value or the supply relation of the merchandise, the social people's mental state and expectation are the decision factor of its internalities.There is different index sign for the generous character of the fictitious economy, the most direct index sign is the total amount of the financial property and the specific value of the year’s GDP, and this is an index sign of the total description，classified of the index signs have the foreign exchange storage of the total amount, the sum of foreign exchange trade, the total amount and structure of stock market , sum of stock certificate trade ,stock to circulate the market price total ，etc.. ІІІ.Chinese Formation Mechanism of the Fictitious Economy The real object economy develops in process to make use of in the currency of continuously widespread became currency a predominance type economy. The development of the currency economy, make medium emergence of society a large quantity owns the currency ownership of the currency purchasing power ,they produce related rights in real economy from the investment activity that makes use of the currency ownership to carry on, then producing market behavior of escape from the real economy activity to the bargain of this kind of rights, the popularization of this kind of bargain,standardize to turn with scale to then become the fictitious economic predominance type economy. Later in Chinese reform and open, the socialism market economy system signs really with market to turn degree to deepen, making China represent the specific value of the M2/GDP that the currency turns degree to rise continuously, making the stock,the bond scale of represent the fictitious economic scale extend continuously, having the material foundation of the reality of the fictitious economic development thus.The perfecting of the Chinese fictitious economic law system management system really signs, providing the system foundation for the Chinese fictitious economy development. Study to the development legal system environment of the western and flourishing nations, the Chinese fictitious economy and the comparison of the system mode, express China needs while internationalize the background, speed financial comprehensive step with management. ІV. The Development Progress of the Chinese Fictitious Economy The fictitious economy of China constitutes to win to take the stock and the bond as its corpus.The earliest stock in China appears in 70's in 19 centuries, the earliest stock certificate bargain produces in 20's in 20 centuries, all there were once stock exchanged in Shanghai,Peking,Tienjin, mainly being engaged in the bargain of the government bonds and stock, closing in 50's for 20 centuries.Shanghai and Shenzhen,stock exchange were established at the beginning of 90's in 20centuries and China Securities Regulatory Commission established in 1992, China had contemporary of stock certificate bargain.See from the development process of Chinese contemporary stock market of 15 years, the development speed is quick,the administration intervention is often to be,the market motion is big,the risk trouble is multifarious,the lawmaking is gradually sound,the innovation accelerates gradually,the market turn the internationalization degree to raise gradually,manage is tend in norm gradually, but the existent problems is still more. The Chinese fictitious economy develops in the existent problem:(1)Capital market excessiveness centralization;(2)Be in need of strict system stipulation, the private relation permeates to trade process;(3)The policy adjustment is too multifarious. The difficulty that the Chinese fictitious economic future development face:(1)Indirect margin and directly the funds of the margin fight;(2)The internationalization predicament of the fictitious economic development;(3)The economic corpus is in need of inner-controlled enlargement risk;(4)Negative exterior been limitless to redeem to the financing institution;(5)The currency sovereignty is subjected to threat. V.The Relation between Fictitious Economy and Real Economy in China Global fictitious economic total amount in 90's in 20 centuries present the trend of the acceleration ascension, still place the Chinese economy that turn economic period of track also exists prosperous of inside living the currency growth mechanism, thus the currency turn to lie the appearance that the ratio of currency, financial related ratios ,and financial interrelations ratio,all is placed in to rise continuously .Carry on real economy and fictitious economy comparison, can discover following difference:(1)The history that the real economy appear is consumedly early in the fictitious economy.(2)See from the contents, the development history of the real economy is the history that the productivity develops well, the contents of the fictitious economy then is more abstract with the simplicity;(3)See from time dimension, the real economy body is past labor of the appearance of the coagulation and realistic production, the fictitious economy then displays the possibility of the future development, body now for to expect in the future.(4)See from the bargain price, the real economy decides to be in the cost and supply relation of the product and the service, fictitious economic product the body then is an idea list price now;(5)From sport the appearance see, the real economy variety is more stable, fictitious economy of the development then has bigger motion;(6)See from the movable space, the real economy is subjected to stipulation on the region, the development of the fictitious economy then asks for help the information technique to get more large space to develop easily.(7)From produce the power define to see, the ownership of the real economy,conduct power,handle power,income power and take up power can opposite separation, but fictitious economy because of the rights of the simplicity the economic characteristic request to produce power to affirm strictly to be with the protection;(8)From trade scale to see, the scale of the real economy under the yoke of its natural appearance,the production possibility boundary, the fictitious economy then obtained complete worth appearance, its scale was an infinite aggrandizement from theories' speak of or underrate to near zero of quantity;(9)See from the division of labour of the real economy and fictitious economy, the real economy creates realistic wealth, the fictitious economy detection is a price in the future. The inside contact of the fictitious economy and real economy:The fictitious economy is in response to the development of the real economy to need but produce, and take real economy as foundation, serving for the further development of the real economy of an economic system.The development of the fictitious economy is subjected to the real economy check and supervision, but the scale of the fictitious economy usually will deviate with the scale occurrence of the real economy.The fictitious economy and real economy has a funds to fight a relation.The fictitious economy has larger motion moderate breezes and insurance than the real economy. The fictitious economy and the interaction of the real economy:The fictitious economy can mobilize a society to save for the real economy, providing the margin support;The fictitious economy can transfer risk with the dispersion, lowering real economy bargain cost;The fictitious economy can announce to public a real economy information effectively;The fictitious economy can raise the society movement efficiency. The division of labour and the cooperation of the fictitious economy and real economy:The modern economy is constituted together by the real economy and the fictitious economy of, two kinds of supply well balance of economic systems adjust a development to come to a decision the whole modern economy harmoniously of well balance,moderate and can keep on a development. The composing of the Chinese fictitious economy carries a body is constitute by the nine great systems:(1)Commercial bank;(2)Stock certificate company;(3)Insurance company;(4)The stock certificate investment fund;(5)Trust the investment company;(6)Futures agent company;(7)QFII;(8) Asset Management Corporation（AMC）;(9)National Central Bank. The blemish of the Chinese fictitious economy:(1)Inborn shortage;(2)The ownership of a share partition;(3)Short of check and balance;(4)The property is inferior to turn;(5)The cost is high. "The gold rate" of the fictitious economy and real economy look for:Total request, the fictitious economy of development, should take the full development of the real economy as a premise;The good relation between fictitious economy and real economy should express for mutually it all is not produce with the development of the oneself to another one square's negative exterior, contrary, should produce a kind of enhance an effect mutually. The basis connection relation between fictitious economy and real economy to the adjustment of the macroscopic policy:(1)Work hard study fictitious economy a development regulation;(2)Pass the development of fictitious economy to extend a direct margin;(3)The formation synthesizes the financial system with management. VI. The Condition of Chinese Fictitious Economy Develops Healthily Flourishing market economy nations all value a development of pass the fictitious economy to promote the real economy developing in the world, also noticing to adjust fictitious economy to take charge of mode in time according to the variety of circumstance. The United States,Japan,all countries in Southeast Asia is in the experience precept enunciation of fictitious economic problem:The fictitious economy healthly develop, the government has to be have predominant function, the policy has to be adjusted in time, the risk control is a key, the investor rights protection is a core. The fictitious economy develops to manage to the government of request:The first, perfect law making.The second, sound organization.The third, the universality of the push reputation culture and the construction of the reputation system.The fourth, strengthen international the governments of multilateral exchanges and cooperate.The fifth, the respect market rule. To the request that participates corpus:Enhance to manage structure of perfect and profession self-discipline. The request of the society and the cultural environment:Set up investor confidence.The United States,Japan,all countries in Southeast Asia is in the experience precept enunciation of fictitious economic problem:The fictitious economy healthly develop, the government has to be have predominant function, the policy has to be adjusted in time, the risk control is a key, the investor rights protection is a core. VII.The Boundary of the Chinese Fictitious Economic Development The Chinese state of the nation is formation of influence factor of fictitious economy to Chinese:Margin outlet,produce power system,ownership of a share to place for cent is inferior with property to turn,circulation outside the body and underground of the funds is financial,the interest rate market turn. Develop a boundary to the fictitious economy to really settle factor:The currency of the economy turns to turn degree with market;The funds spillage of the real economy and the afflux scale of the exterior funds;Information the technical usage and safe guarantee;Jural sound;Financial innovation;The development and the stability of the society. The fictitious economy escapes from the situation of the real economy:(1)The bargain of the fictitious currency;(2)The business enterprise usage from have a funds to carry on production;(3)Publish the government bonds support government consume; (4)Business enterprise direct margin under of the capital becoming;(5)Business enterprise indirect margin under of the capital becoming;(6) Tobin q phenomenon. The reason that the fictitious economy escapes from the real economy:(1)Bigger motion;(2)The complexity of the price decision;(3)Turn under the track condition of indetermination. The fictitious economy takes place the form of crisis:The stock market tumble,the currency a huge sum of depreciate,the futures market take place huge loss in business,the financing institution is in great quantities bankrupt to close down etc.. The development trend of the Chinese fictitious economy:(1)The development of the real economy will create more ample energy for the fictitious economic system;(2)Information the technical development provided the technique the guarantee for the efficiently circulate of the fictitious economy;(3)The finance mixs already a camp ages and may come according to schedule;(4)The financial innovation will get a fast fierce development. VIII. The Fictitious Economic Angle of Chinese Macroscopic Economy Evaluation and Adjustion Under the closed economic system, the GDP growth means the growth of citizen's wealth, openning gradually of the economy makes the GDP have to increase continuously of living to change quantity outside, open under condition of the GDP and physically wealthy consistency be decided by the exchanges of the domestic and international funds and the commutation of the resources, and the rate of exchange in this kind of funds exchanges change to exchange and resources in of price motion.Take US$ as the international currency of the lord to exist among nations inside of the depreciation incline to of under condition, the economic development of the exit of Chinas direction type strategy appear the GDP high speed growth,foreign exchange storage a high-speed growth also, but the domestic take up employment to live improved phenomenon without the equal degree, this is the material resources and foreign fictitious exchange that uses real economy to exchange actually, producing thus of the wealth shrink. See from the circumstance of the United States, fictitious economy of development not only can become the valid risk income coupling mechanism, dissolve the financial risk in the economic growth, and can to the funds of the outside of the economy become hold out for long time of attraction, can make use of a global resources to used for the economy growth and develop, therefore, Chinese government also should fit government fixed position definitely, norm business enterprise management,pursue true wealth,steadily push forward finance innovation, thus for the growth of Chinese economy create new development space.

Title: Studies on Anti-Japanese War of Korean in Southeast China (1910-1945)
Abstract: In August, 1910, the Korean Peninsula completely comes down to be the Japanese imperialism colony. Facing the peril of the country and the disaster of the nation, a lot of ambitious gentlemen against the Japanese imperialism who were unwilling to become a slaves without a country migrated to northeast China to make a vigorous start to have carried out anti-Japanese self-movement, in the cause of the independence of Korea and national liberation, it has composed a magnificent epic of Chinese and Korean resisting Japanese aggressor commonly, until a total victory of China's War of Resistance Against Japan in 1945. During the period from 1910 to 1945, Korean anti-Japanese war in northeast China may be divided into three stages: From 1910 to 1919 is the preparation stage of Korean anti-Japanese war in northeast China. In the stage , Korea Nat led the Korean in northeast China to carry out actively to resist the Japanese which took emphasis on patriotic education of anti-Japanese war , construction of anti-Japanese self-movement base areas and the cultivate of military talented person. Not having attached great importance to, although Nat knows the necessity of an armed struggle, which had led to the failure of “313Motion of Dragon Well” in 1919. Bitter experience urged the Nat to come to know that it was impossible to realize the national independence and the national liberation purpose fighting in peaceful way. Therefore, taking “313Motion of Dragon Well” as a turning point, Nat begins to form the anti-Japanese armed forces team actively in northeast China, and gather strength for Korea Revolutionary War accumulates in the future. From 1920 to1931 before the incident of Sep. 18th, is the stage that Korean in northeast China carried out the anti-Japanese armed struggle all round. This expects for a short while, the group allies carried out anti-Japanese self-movement led by Korea Nat owing to disparity in strength reality between the enemy and the selves. Fengwudong war and Qingshanli war in June and October, 1920, are the first successes that anti-Japanese war led by Korea Nat allies. The brilliant military victory has stimulated the spirit of defeating the Japan aggressor, and the belief of realizing a nation’s independence. After the centre of Korean Nat of anti-Japanese self-movement had transferred to the south area, consultant mansion and the justice mansion set up here in 1924, and has set up a prefecture of Xin Min City in 1925. After 1927, Korean Nat and unique Party of active communist organization nation help to bring about a motion with the purpose of building the broad anti-Japanese Korea nation united front in northeast China. Because of the big difference between them, Korea nation resisting Japanese invasion united front failed to be formed ultimately. From the incident of Sep. 18th in 1931 to Japan imperialism was defeated in 1945 is the stage that China-DPRK people allies carrying out the anti-Japanese armed struggle. During this period, both the Nat and the communist have changed the revolution route; China-DPRK unity came to be their common guiding ideology. In the same time, the Korea revolutionary army in south led by the Nat unites, and independent Korea Republic army in north area, united with Chinese soldiers and civilians presently, and resisted the Japan aggressor commonly. Being deserving to be mentioned especially is that the anti-Japanese people revolutionary army and the first army unity in northeast China was a notable struggle, which moved one to song and tears. The Korean communist defies hardship , did not stint life, have made major contribution for the building-up of the people revolutionary army in northeast China and have offered all strengths to the Chinese nation liberation . Meanwhile, they have also fulfilled the historic mission of Korean independence and the national liberation. Recollecting of the history of Koreans resisting Japanese invasion in northeast China from 1910 to 1945, is encouraging, and also is deep in thought. Appraising this one historical fact rightly, excavating the patriotism feelings, noble national integrity, unyielding revolution fighting spirit and disinterested spirit of internationalism have very important history significance. Drawing experience and lessons among them, taking history as warning, have peculiar significance and value. From 1910s, Nat leads the extensive Korea public carry out actively resisting Japanese invasion. They have got the achievement of improving anti-Japanese mental consciousness of Korea public, reinforcing anti-Japanese base area building and training anti-Japanese military and so on. But we have to be seen that, by class limitation effect, Nat has failed to work out the proper political platform on that time, and lost most important support strength from public. The loss and disruption led to the anti-Japanese group being weakened with graveness opposite. The anti-Japanese team effective strength and fighting fruit fails because of there existing the grave localism and factionalism in self. But deep of bitter experiences have shown that, without moping up localism, factionalism and grave factional strife completely, even if having founded the anti-Japanese group, will become feeble and die because of internal disruption and the opposite. During the past the beginning of 1920 age, the early Korea communist composes Korea Manchuria general administration of the Communist Party has gone deep into spreading Marxism and social revolution, has improved nation sense of responsibility and class consciousness of northeast China Korea public, and has strengthened them devoting into the anti-Japanese enthusiasm and national liberation movement. They have not only of expanded the organization basis of cadres and masses, but also trained a lot of talented person for China. Meanwhile, they have organized a lot of progress group, carried out fighting against feudalism actively, forceful boosted domestic national revolution of Korea moving. Korea Manchuria general administration of the Communist Party failed to form the leading nucleus because of the fighting of the factions inside which affected them carrying out anti-Japanese war in a further way. When spreading Marxism-Leninism, the Korean communist was confined to the Korean public only. They failed to combine revolutionary theory with concrete conditions of northeast China Korea public, concrete Chinese revolution reality very good, and failed to ally with extensive Chinese People during the period of the activity of carrying out revolution. The limitations of early phase communism group and Manchuria general administration was combined with which they were in the childhood stage at that time, the Marxism-Leninism theoretical level was not high, and they were short of revolution fighting experience. But whose main cause, depend on that they still stood on the position of Korean revolution prolongs theory to consider Korean independence and national liberation. From this, it had explained deeply that only when we take Marxism as guidance steadfastly, and was tied in wedlock with revolution reality that time closely, ascertain the correct revolution route in a appropriate manner to local conditions, can it be able to overcome the class limitation, overcome the various erroneous ideological trend, and unite all the strength, expand the revolutionary forces unceasingly, until getting the victory ultimately. There is a glittering in the summing up of Korean resisting Japanese invasion in northeast China that Korean in northeast China led by CPC united person of noble aspirations of anti-Japanese war of Chinese nation rapidly and intensely, have composed a magnificent epic that Korea-China people resisted Japanese invasion commonly and righted the enemy valiantly, which has establish the solid basis for both countries to reinforce the China-DPRK working together age after age and contacting with each other, and continued the friendship history . The Korea communist began to abandon Korean revolution prolongs theory, joined the Communist Party of China organization numerously and confusedly according to "one same clique as the country of" Communist International and the principles made by the 6th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party. It not only has expanded the strength of Communist Party of China in northeast China, and has accelerated work centre of the Communist Party of China in northeast China transferring from city metastasis to rural area. Uncounted Korean communist opposing still carried out resisting Japanese invasion with the suspicion of "people's livelihood regiment " in fight of resisting" left" ,"people's livelihood regiment " . The Korean revolutionist did not mind individual safety and danger, gave no consideration to individual humiliation in adverse circumstances environment, they took anti-Japanese war as first-class mission all the time. That has educated northeast China public extensively, and stimulate them to advance wave upon wave , fight with Japanese bravely. The disinteresting action and noble feelings of concentrating efforts on liberating all the time of extensive Korean revolutionist who was not fussy about nation advantages and disadvantages will be engraved on forever by the Chinese nation. Afterwards, the extensive Korean revolutionist and Korean advance wave upon wave defying hardship under he anti-Japanese national united front led by Communist Party of China. They were brave in the face of danger from powerful Japan aggressor, united with China shoulder to shoulder and were encouraged fight with Japanese person all the time in the distressed and lofty environment, which has shown the unyielding national integrity and written the brilliant history fighting bravely. The China-DPRK revolutionist have attacked the Japan aggressor in close coordination, were at bay and brave in innumerable time of anti-Japanese guerrilla warfare battle during the people revolutionary army period and unite-resisting period. The Korean revolutionist have irrigated Chinese land with blood, dedicated life to liberation of China-DPRK people under the banner of the proletariat and the patriotism. The revolutionary friendship of the Korea-China revolutionist going through thick and thinning together in revolutionary has become the historical origins Of China-DPRK people in present age continuing the friendship and developing in cooperation. Keywords: Northeast of China; Korean; Anti-Japanese war

Title: The Study on Financial Risk During Transitional Period And on Transferring of Fiscal Risk to Financial Risk
Abstract: Along with accelerating reforms of financial system and state-owned enterprises, financial risks have been drawing increasing attentions, especially since the Asian Financial Crisis of 1997. How to prevent and avert financial risks thus need to be investigated into. In order to control the financial risks or to tackle any financial crisis in China, it is necessary to clearly understand the systemic reasons, and internal and external factors that cause the financial risks. Theoretically, financial risks stem from limitation of sensibility and asymmetry of information, but the features of financial risks vary in different countries for specific reasons. There are quantities of papers on the common reasons for financial risks, but few on the financial risks in China during transitional period, especially on transferring of fiscal risk in China to financial risks. Having analyzed the special formation system of financial risks during the transitional period and the transferring of the fiscal risks, this thesis manages to explore the pre-warning system and strategy to prevent and avert financial risk during transitional period in China. The thesis consists of six chapters. It begins with reviewing of former theories on the financial risk and constructing of a new theory framework, which shall be the basis to further investigate. Then it systematically looks into the formation mechanism of financial risk from internal formation system and external transferring system. Having reviewed the pre-warning system in foreign countries and the transferring of fiscal risks in China to financial risks, it investigates both the internal and external factors that cause the financial risks during the transitional period in China. Finally, it comes up with suggestions on how to establish new type relations between fiscal system and financial system, and strategies to avert financial risks. Chapter One carries detailed analysis of Marxist and Western theories on financial risks after analysis of generic theories and reasons for formation of financial risks. According to the author, financial risks refer to the magnitude and probability of losses caused to the entity by uncertainty and fluctuation in the economic factors in the financial market under certain conditions and in certain periods. The magnitude and probability of losses are essential to reflect financial risks. Generally, the financial risks stem mainly from economic and social specialization, multiform of its derivative transactions, limited sensibility and opportunistic inclinations by economic participants, uncertainty of economic conditions, asymmetry of information, and financial system and its evolvement. Chapter Two systematically analyzes the formation of the financial risks mainly from financial system, economic structure, and opening economy. It argues that under the floating exchange rate system, there usually exists excessive fluctuation and mismatch in the exchange rates. The floating exchange rate system will speed up the internationalization of virtual capital, and then increase the uncertainty and risks of the financial markets. Then weakened control by monetary authority over the speculative capitals contributes to the fast growth and movement of speculative capitals and thus generates negative impacts on the world economy. However, under the highly integrated global financial system, the peg system will also have irresolvable internal conflicts. When the control over capital flows is loosened, the peg system will usually magnify the external impacts and thus make a currency crisis and the Domino Effect quite easy. Among those factors leading to financial crisis, actual economic and investment activities are always the main ones. It can be seen from the flaws and mistakes in economic and investment activities, financial risks caused by economic cyclical fluctuations and structural changes. Even the financial investment process that is more and more deeply affected by the formation process of financial risks is also subject to the actual economic and investment activities. In addition, modern information transmission and financial liberalization substantially accelerate fund moving in the global financial market. Investors, fund-suppliers, and markets in each country thus all merge into global financial market. Such a global capital moving, far beyond goods and merchandise, becomes one of most active factors in the current world economy, and then forcibly influences the allocation of international financial resources in the global range, and alternates each country’s economic efficiency, and increases the volatility and uncertainty of price signal, and supply and demand of financial transactions. Especially, a large scale of international short-term capital consequently imposes impact on the effectiveness of macro-economic policies of each government and on the micro-decision of each sort of economic entity. Chapter Three preliminarily explores the modality of establishment of financial risk pre-warning and prevention system in China based on empirical study of the foreign financial risk pre-warning and prevention system. The author argues that all macro-departments are inter-related and there exist causal relations among macro-economic indicators, and continuously worsened macro-economic indicators always come first before financial crisis. A pre-warning system can inform people of an impending financial crisis and help the people to avert it. History teaches people that it is urgent and necessary to set up a system to monitor the financial risks. In reality, it is very difficult to analyze and forecast financial risks and crises. Such a comprehensive analysis on different types of financial risks is imperative. It is difficult to classify a financial crisis into a certain category, but a big financial crisis always comes after an unbalanced economy that contains a certain kind of financial risk. Therefore, pre-warning should start from pre-warning on the initial financial risks, which is significant in preventing the outbreak of financial crises. Chapter Four systematically analyzes both the internal and external factors causing the financial crisis during the transitional period in China respectively from the structural factors, market factors and international factors. The purpose to study the financial crisis in China is to get to know the features of financial risks in China and to prevent the financial safety in China from the accumulation of financial risks. The author believes that there exist diversity and controllability of financial risks in a market economy while concentration and invisibility in the planning system. Then accumulation and acceleration will feature the financial risks during the transitional periods in China. At present, China is transforming from planning system to market economy; both old and new systems coexist. On the one hand, old system is still functioning in many areas of the social economy, blocking the setup and operating of the new system. On the other hand, the new system originating from the old system is still imperfect and can not yet effectively regulate and adjust its own operations. As a result, the new system has to resort to the old system. Under the current special circumstances the financial risks in China not only carries the generic risks in the market economy and traditional risks during the early stages of financial market but also are featured as systemic risks during the transitional period in China. The author has indicated that financial problems are results of long-term accumulation, reflecting multi-layer internal conflicts embedded in the economy: not only systemic factors but also managerial factors, not only structural reasons arising from the transitions from the planning economy to the market economy but also imbalances generated from the financial system reforms; not only problems generated from transitions from closed economic system to the open economic system but also problems stemming from imbalances in the market economy; not only historical problems but also new problems generated from the excessive expansion of capital because of the soft budgeting. Due to the complexity, diversity and comprehensiveness, comprehensive measures and strategies must be taken against financial risks. Chapter Five systematically analyzes the transferring of the fiscal risks in China to the financial risk based on its elaborating of relations between fiscal risks and financial risks. Owing to defects of fiscal policy in China and mismatch of fiscal and monetary policies, it is a long period the state treasury has been leading to accumulation of financial risks by having financial institutions finance its expenditures by which fiscal risks were transferred. In other words, the transferring of fiscal risks to financial risks relies on the close relations between state treasury and financial institutions. The author argues that banks depend on the balance of fund flow-in and flow-out with a steady state. While the outcome of the transferring of fiscal risks to banks will be to utilize the fund of saving deposit, and then the assets of this utilization will mainly evolve risk assets of the banks. Such a transferring weakens banks’ liquidity and violates business order of banking sector, and brings about many of restructure, withdrawal and bankruptcy of financial institutions. Nevertheless the cost of dissolving the risks are much higher than one of leading to risks. Chapter Six comes up with ideas and methodologies to prevent and dissolve financial risks in China from the aspects of strategies, environments, macro & micro-economic policies. The author proves that both state treasury and financial institutions are fund providers, but different features of the funds from two channels define their range and mechanism and objects. Sometimes state treasury and financial institutions overlap their activities, but such a overlapping cannot change the basic features of non-compensation of fiscal fund or compensation of credit fund. So fiscal activities and financial activities shall abide each own rules and play proper roles in different areas. In practice, the most important task is currently to define the functions of state treasury and financial institutions and the relations of these two fund suppliers, and then to confine the activities of two sectors and the rules for special issues. Thus, to effectively prevent and dissolve financial risks during transitional period in China need not only flexibly coordinating fiscal and monetary policies, but also taking corresponding measures at the levels of macro µ economies. At the period when financial institutions adopt modern enterprise system and rules, supervisory institution shall adapt itself to the trend of mixing financial businesses and establish the financial supervision and administration system that suits China’s situations.

Title: China's Ethnic Regional Autonomy System and the Economic Development in Xinjiang
Abstract: Ethnic regional autonomy is creative decision-making of the Communist Party of China in solving the Chinese nationality question. It is the China's basic political system whose basic goal is to maintain the unification of China multinational country and to realize various nationalities equality, the unity and the common prosperity. According to the Marxism political economy principle, the economic basis and the overtop structure restrict and affect mutually. As the politics overtop structure, the system of ethnic regional autonomy can display its superiority and realize various nationalities' communal development truly only then it adapts and consummates mutually with the economical development of the regional autonomy for nationalities place. Therefore, whether it is advantageous to the productive forces development in the multi-national area.whether it isadvantageous to various nationalities living standard enhancement become the important criterion and the basic standard to adhere to and consummate the system of ethnic regional autonomy. Xinjiang has a general region, multitudinous nationalities and relatively thick religious atmosphere; the peripheral geography environment is complex. The economical development is not balanced for a long time. Xinjiang's economical development not only relates to the Xinjiang various nationalities' vital interest, moreover relates to the stablity of China's border area and the long-term peace. Considering to the congenital deficience of Xinjiang’s economic development as well as each kind of complex social factor in restricting economy development, it is impossible to develop in the short time if there have not the pointed system to make the safeguard. Therefore, Xinjiang’s economic development must be based on special system that suits Xinjiang actual condition. Through the scientific and reasonable system that mountain ethnic relations solve the nationality question, respect nationality multiplicity development realizes the unification approval of various nationalities. This can realize the organic synthesis of solving nationality question and keeping country unification. And in this foundation, through the related policy arrangement, stimulates the intrinsic power of Xinjiang various nationalities to achieve the basic goal of national equality, development and common prosperity China's ethnic regional autonomy system is the union of "the political factor" and "the economic agent". "The political factor" refers to that it is the main symbol of national equality and it makes each national minority to be the master of their own affairs in national autonomy place. At the same time, China's ethnic regional autonomy system makes the national minorities willing to form the great family of nationalities with the Han Nationality and other national minorities, unites voluntarily into the political basis of a unified country. Then "economic agent" refers to the economic cooperation relations in a local scope. The establishment of regional autonomy for nationalities forms the supplementary economical relations between the national minority and the Han Nationality which is helpful to the national equality and the national unity, achieves the correct union of "the political factor" and "the economic agent". Looked from this, the establishment and development of ethnic regional autonomy system is the epoch-making important matter in Xinjiang. It causes various races populace to enjoy truly the right of being the masters of their own affairs. It has provided for the policy environment and the political basis to maintain China’s unity and economic, cultural and social enterprise development and the implementation of national equal principle in Xinjiang. The various nationalities surmounted the different stages of the social development, developed largely the agricultural synthesis productivity and established modern industry system of the quite reasonable structure, more prominent characteristic from a backward area where basically did not have the modern industry and could not be self-sufficient after building the system of ethnic regional atuonomy. The practice of 50 years in Xinjiang proved the ethnic regional autonomy system conforms to the Chinese national condition, conforms to the Xinjiang reality, serves various nationalities' basic interest and has the formidable vitalit. The establishment of ethnic regional autonomy system is one of the basic reasons of Xinjiang economic development before the reform and open policy. Early days of liberation, Xinjiang's economic society level of development was extremely low; the national barrier formed in the history was very deep. Therefore, the Communist Party of China carried on the party building, established the people’s government at that time, put down a rebellion bandits in order to stable social order and earnestly implemented party's national religion policy. What more important was the movement of the rent reduction and the land reform under the realistic condition of the nationality religion in Xinjiang caused various races people to stand up in politics and economy.acted as the master. This eliminated fundamentally the foundation of nationality oppressed, laid the solid foundation for the realization of the new ethnic relations and the development of equal cooperation. Under this premise, Xinjiang carried out the establishment of the ethnic regional autonomy system.gradually. The ethnic regional autonomy system had provided good environment to the economic development in Xinjiang before the reform and open policy. It had guaranteed the implementation realization of preferential policy of the country to Xinjiang. At the same time, it impelled the correct solution of Xinjiang’s nationality religion question, thus promoted the Xinjiang economic development before the reform and open policy. On the other hand, Xinjiang's planned economy system restricted seriously the national region autonomy right before the reform and open policy. Under this system, local authority's jurisdiction was very small, the majority of decision-making was made by the central government and the autonomy place did not obtain the economic right to develop local economy independendly according to the realistic condition. Although the central government supported Xinjiang through many preferential policies in fund, manpower and physical resource, the neglect of commodity economy and the law of value, neglect its own characteristic in Xinjiang had brought the negative function for the long-term development of the ethnic regional autonomy place. The economic autonomy was unable to carry out caused the restriction to realize other autonomy right. Therefore, economic development under the planned economy system played a important role to the consolidation of the ethnic regional autonomy system only in the certain time, the superiority of multi-national area can not be displayed if it was implementated for a long term. The basic goal of the ethnic regional autonomy system is to realize the nationalities’ development and the enhancement of nationality living standard is its basic goal. If it cannot be achieve, how does the regional autonomy superiority manifest? How does the national equality maintain? After "the Great Cultural Revolution" movement had ended the process of the reform and open policy starts to carry on in xinjiang after bringing order out of chaos and the comprehensive realization of ethnic regional autonomy system. The farmland and pasture economic restructuring enable various races herdsman to get rid of impoverishment. The rural enterprise has sped up the step which various races herdsman became rich. The urban economy organizational reform has improved and raised enormously the city inhabitant's living standard. The opening to the outside world has also caused various races people to break through the region limit and moves towards the world. These huge changes have consolidated the ethnic regional autonomy system in xinjiang's implementation. At the same time, the ethnic regional autonomy system has built the stable and harmonious social environment for xinjiang's economic restructuring. The formulation implementation of the Law of national region has provided the legal safeguard for xinjiang's reform and open policy. Training and using national minority cadre vigorously is the key which reform and open policy smoothly carries on in xinjiang. Developing the national minority culture and the education vigorously has raised the talented person of all kinds of fields during the process of the reform and open policy. Along with the further deepening of economic restructuring and after the establishment of socialist market economy system in the 90s of the twenties century, some national region preferential policies formulated under the planned economy system expire gradually. Adds on the country non-balanced developmental strategy, the economical development disparity has enlarged unceasingly between xinjiang and the eastern area as well as in the different places within xinjiang. The national minority is in the inferiority in the market competition, which has created the non-synchronization between the regional development and the nationality development and has increased the harmonious factor between the different nationalities. Looking from the international environment, the great change in some socialist countries in eastern European and the disintegration of former Soviet Union made great effect to the world’s condition. The western hostile influence try to split up China using" national religion question" and carries on the seepage to xinjiang. Such questions present the new challenge to our persisting and consolidating the ethnic regional autonomy system. The great change in east Europe and the former Soviet Union also showed that the serious unbalanced condition of economical development in the different regions and nationalities initiated the nationality to separate based on strengthening the national consciousness and creates the tragedy of country’s disintegration in the end. Therefore, the important guarantee of the stability and the development of china under the economical globalization background is to further consummate the ethnic regional autonomy system and to promote the economic society development in the multi-national area and to reduce the development disparity in the East-West section area based on their experience and lessons and links to the Chinese reality. The development strategy of the west areas in China is present on the 15th session of Fourth Plenary Session of Communist Party of China through the paper of
