Title: The Research on the Values of Crime Stratification in Criminal Policy and Criminal Legislation
Abstract: Crime refers to the behavior harmful to the society, which should be cracked down. Crime Stratification means all the crimes are stratified to different levels according to the severity degree of the crime. Crime policy is an integrated system including strategy, policy, tactic and method, established by the country and society to crack down on the crime effectively and reasonably. The criminal policy importance of crime stratification holds: according to the severity of the crime, all the crimes shall be stratified to different levels, which can be treated with different principles and methods, if it is appropriate and effective in the control of crime, if it is enforceable, what is the positive perspective and what is the negative, how to achieve the best crime control effect and how to design it specifically. Criminal legislation means that: what affect one theory or idea can have on the legislation, or how it is necessary and enforceable in the legislation. With the above concepts, the paper mainly illustrates on the following contents: I. A Summary of Crime Stratification, which includes two questions : one is the mode of crime stratification, which means the mode that all crimes are stratified into different levels according to the severity degree in terms of criminal law. The criminal laws in the world can be divided into such modes as : 1. Dichotomy Mode, that means all the criminal laws are stratified into two levels according to the severity degree or penalty of the crime. 2. Trichotomy Mode, that means all the criminal laws are stratified into three levels according to the severity degree or penalty of the crime. 3. Quartation Mode, all the criminal laws are stratified into four levels according to the severity degree or penalty of the crime. 4. Multichotomy Mode, all the criminal laws are stratified into five or even more levels according to the severity degree or penalty of the crime. The other is the standard of the crime stratification, which falls into two categories : 1. according to the severity of the penalty, the crime behavior are stratified. This is called the form standard. 2. the crime behavior can be stratified according to the severity or the nature and degree of damage to the society by the crime behavior. It is called the entity standard, de facto standard or severity standard. According to the difference of the judged subject, the entity standard is based on three perspectives : nation perspective, which is also called legislator’s perspective, means the legislator judege the severity of the crime on behalf of the country ; expert perspective, which represents the conceptual knowledge of the criminal law scholar on teh severity of the crime ; the hoi polloi perspective, which means the judgement made by the hoi polloi on the severity of the crime. This judgements are mostly based on sesibility. II. The importance of crime stratification to the criminal decision. Criminal decision refers to the decision of the crime control and ruling of all the related departments and fields. For the convenience of analysis, the paper will take “Severe Crack Down” as a sample for the analysis of criminal decision-making. It is detailed as: the crime can be stratified to two levels according to the severity of the crime. Those crimes that cause severe threat to the society and people will be severely cracked down. However, the crimes that do not cause severe damage to the society will have comparatively loose criminal policy. The purpose is to make the criminal decision more reasonable. As to the “Sever Crack Down”, the effect of crime stratification can include: 1. it make the “Crack Down” more reasonable, systematical, less emotionally involved and make the decision making more scientifically. 2. It can change the profile of “Crack Down” from a movement to a reasonable and appropriate criminal policy and minimize the negative effect; 3. it can realize the reasonable distribution of the judicatory resource between the severe and light crime and maximize the effect of criminal law, protect the human rights and enhance the spirit of law; 4. it can realize the connection and exchange between the Chinese criminal policy and the international criminal policy. III. The role crime stratification plays in the integral criminal law system. Based on a substantial understanding of the concept of crime and penalty, the “General Penalty” refers to a law principle that brings people certain kind of suffering from exploitation as a consequence of law breach. In the context of Chinese situation, it includes criminal law, labor cultivation, police penalty. The specific idea of crime stratification is that: all the crimes are stratified according to the severity; the severity of the penalty is dependent on the severity of the crime. The penalty system is set up according to the severity of the crime. Based on this thread and the auxiliary efforts of policy penalty system, the general system can work smoothly. Thus, a legal system that can have penalty in accordance with the severity of the crime will be established. The effect the crime stratification has on the law is: 1. it is good to promote the reasonable distribution and integral enforcement of the national power; 2. it is good for the realization of the legalization and the judicature of the criminal field; 3. it is good for the reasonable adjustment of the criminal law subjects and the crime behavior penalty system. IV. The role crime stratification plays in the regulation and adjustment of the criminal law. The current “Small Criminal Law” system (including penal code, criminal law amendments, single file criminal law and legislation interpretation) in our country has many demerits in terms of crime stratification. The writer thinks that the an introduction of crime stratification in the criminal law system, the replacement of current judgment system on the crime with crime stratification, can make the criminal system more standardized and effective. Although, the analysis takes the current criminal law system as a sample, the principle illustrated here is also suitable for the criminal law system after the integration. The effect that crime stratification has on the smooth work of criminal law system is mainly on two perspectives: one is it can correct the original criminal laws; the second is that it is a reasonable addition to the original version. The former includes: 1. replace the enumeration legislation with crime stratification, and realize the integration of standard; 2. restrict the sentence with crime stratification; 3. replace the general criterion on which the severity of the crime is judged with crime stratification, and realize the transition of the system. The latter includes: 1. Restrict the penalty scope of the prepared and abortive behavior with crime stratification, change the current rules in the criminal law that there is no discrimination on the sentence and treatment of different crimes at different degrees; 2. Construct a reasonable criminal record abolishing system with crime stratification, make judgment on the time of criminal record abolishing with the severity and damage of the criminal behavior. Crime stratification is also connected to the criminal law systems such as: the penalty scope of co-criminal, assoil system, recidivism, etc. What’s more, Crime stratification can make contribution to the restriction of death penalty. It is detailed as: independently set up the most severe crime level in the crime stratification，and the level should be defined as intended crime and the consequence is detrimental to people’s life；Then it is prescribed in the general principles of the criminal law that death penalty is only restricted to the most severe crime, and the accusal of the death penalty can be restricted by the special provisions according to the meaning of “the most severe crime” in the general principle. Thus the restriction on death penalty can be maximized on the legislation and justice practice. V. The inspection and review of crime stratification. The construction of crime stratification systems have to be based on the current experiences and avoid the repetition of the mistakes and suitable for the need of the society and the time. The experiences that crime stratification can use for reference are as followed: the historical experience of crime stratification in China；the historical experience of crime stratification in other countries, and the crime stratification experience in the practice of Chinese criminal law. There are two perspectives in the Chinese historical experience: 1. The legislators integrate the country’s will and people’s belief. Currently, as the legislation representative, the country must attach great importance to the value belief and interest demand of the residence rather than blindly taking accounts to the national interests only; 2. Replace the original “Ten Severe Crimes” with “Ten Ferocity”, which boasts the function of instruction and prevention rather than crack down afterwards. The current crime stratification system shall also notice the instruction and prevention functions of the criminal law. The experience in other countries includes: 1. Crime stratification must catch up with the social and cultural concept; 2. Crime stratification must match with other laws and regulations；3. Restrict the national administration right by crime stratification；4. The mode of crime stratification must be reasonable；5. Crime stratification must be integrated with other criminal law systems；6. Restrict the application of death penalty by crime stratification；7. Promote the justice of sentence by crime stratification；8. Avoid unreasonable factors in the crack down of crime by crime stratification；9. Attach importance to the technological difficulties triggered by the factors like crime circumstance in crime stratification. The experience in China includes:（1）the practice of criminal law: the decision intends to restrict the subjects of the crack down to the severe crimes. This concept should be insisted on; （2） the legislation of criminal law has to be notified that:：there has to be a good join between the criminal law (broad sense) and the administrative penalty in terms of the stratification on the penalty object. There should not be any enforcement vacancy left. There should be a reasonable line between the criminal law and administrative rule in terms of the nature of crime.（3）In terms of criminal law enforcement, the law enforcement department has no definite requirements on the stratification，but different departments and bodies tend to stratify in many cases. As a collectivity, the judicial practice needs crime stratification and actually is carrying on the crime stratification. This demand of crime stratification will be reflected in many ways. Some of the expressions have to be changed. The most suitable way is by the improving the crime stratification system through legislation. VI. The Bases of Crime stratification: the bases of crime stratification refer to the warranty, which can decide the severity of the crime, in other words, the “ Severity of the Social Damage” by the crime. The inner structure includes objective damage and subjective intention. The objective damage shall include the factors below: 1. The crime object, or legal interest, which had two perspectives of comparison: the first is a comparison among the individual, national and social legal interest. The conclusion is: the individual legal interest is superior to the national in terms of development. The second is a comparison among the factors of the individual legal interest. The conclusion is that the right of life is the most important, then comes the integrity of the body and health, and then, the right of freedom and property, the last is the right of reputation, religious freedom and other rights. 2. Behavior and Means: different crime behavior has different harm. The more violent the behavior is the more harmful it is to the victim. According to the violence of the behavior, the crime behavior can be divided as violent crime and non-violent crime; the former is divided into armed violent crime and ordinary violent crime in terms of whether weapons are used in the crime; the latter basically includes deceived and secrete ways. In terms of the organization of the crime behavior, they can be divided as: organized crime, gang and non organized crime. 3. The realized degree of the behavior. 4. The crime object, which includes: if the crime object is fragile to the crime and the importance of the object. 5. The fatalness of the doer. 6. Time and venue. The degree of the subjective crime intension can be reverted to the degree of the control the psychological movements poses to the realization of the behavior, on which the severity of the crime can be judged. 1. In terms of the cognizing process, the clearer the cognizing of the behavior or the conjuncture, the definite of the consequence of the behavior or conjecture, thus, the more damage it will cause. 2. In terms of the volition process, the more intense the crime behavior, the more perseverant of tackling the difficulties on crime, the clear the volition, the more harmful the intended crime. While in the involuntary crime, the less intended the criminal, the more dangerous it is to the society. The cognizing process plays a decisive role in the judgment of crime severity. 3. In terms of emotion, if the criminal realizes the possible legal penalty of its crime but remains fearless, the damage will be very harmful; if the criminal realizes by committing the crime he or she can get a kind of benefit, this will also cause great danger to the society. 4. In terms of psychological condition, it's the background of the psychological movements expression. The background can sometimes influence the cognition scope and the will power. In a state of excitement, the cognition is not comprehensive and the control power is dramatically dropped. The emotion crime shall be extended with mercy. For in the circumstance, the individual is quite difficult to control the behavior. If the criminal committed the crime in a very stable psychological situation, he or she shall be denounced accelerated. VII. The specific rules of crime stratification. In the current cognitive ability, the detailed stratification principles can be defined according to the social harm degree factors: 1. The most harmful objective crime and subjective intention, which show no sign of convergence, shall be judged as severe crime. 2. The lest harmful objective crime and subjective intention, which show no sign of reinforcement shall be judged as the lightest crime. 3. The severity of the crime is zero, thus the objective crime and subjective intention are not be judged as crime. 4. If the objective crime and subjective intention are accelerated in the same direction, the severity of the crime will be increased, and vice versa. 5. When there is a contradiction between objective crime and subjective intention, that is to say, the objective crime increase will cause the decrease of subjective intention, vice versa, then the lighter party will have decisive role on the judgment of severity. The effect of public comments on crime stratification, the author holds that: based on a reasonable analysis of the scholar, it can be adjusted according to the result of survey on public opinion. This can furthermore meet the emotional demand of the public; increase their cognition of the law. The reason why it can not be set as the main base is that the public comments are emotional judgment rather than reasonable judgment, which can be distorted sometimes because of lack of understanding on the truth. The effect that crime circumstance has on crime stratification shall be treated according to the difference of categories. （1）crime circumstance can fall into two categories such as: the general principle and special prescription. The former is not in the scope of discussion, it has no effect on crime stratification.（2）crime circumstance can be divided into composing circumstance and sentence criterion circumstance. The latter has no effect on crime stratification. The former can influence the crime stratification，but it depends.（3）The composing circumstance falls into basic, aggravated and alleviated circumstances in terms of its function. In terms of expression form, it can be divided as abstract and specified composing circumstance. The category of abstract composing circumstance is overlapped with the basic, aggravated and alleviated circumstances. It is abstract basic composing circumstance, abstract alleviate composing circumstance and abstract aggravate composing circumstance. After the implement of crime stratification system, the quantitative crime factors will be abolished，the abstract basic composing circumstance can be out of the prescription；In terms of the spirit of human rights protection, the abstract aggravated composing circumstance shall not influence the level of crime. The abstract alleviated composing circumstance shall also be avoided. The specified composing circumstance and the aggravated or alleviated composing circumstance are overleaped. In other words, they fall into the category as: specified aggravated composing circumstance and specified alleviated composing circumstance. It is reasonable that the specified aggravated and alleviated circumstances have influence on the crime level. Crime stratification shall be based on the standard of legal sentence criterion, which is based on the standard of free sentence in the main sentence; the free sentence adopts the highest point；the specific levels can be defined by the length of free sentence, which can be decided on the final stratification.

Title: The Research on the Control of the Price of Equipment
Abstract: Global strategy pattern readjusting with the multipolarization change trend causes the development of national defense facing with the unprecedented opportunity and the challenge. The present stage consummates gradually which in the knowledge economy fast development and the socialist market economy system, the army equipment construction development external environment and the intrinsic essential factor has all had the remarkable change. The original high degree of concentration, the plan tows the equipment management pattern, is transforming gradually into the level-to-level administration and the market direction pattern. The price work took in the equipment work the important constituent, it namely is closely linked with the equipment construction, also close unites with the national economy national economy and the national defense science and technology industrial development, which synthetically reflects and affects the equipment construction development scale and the advancement, and also concerns equipment construction general situation. The correct analysis current international domestic new situation, the new situation, the new problem, exploring and grasping the work characteristics and rules of equipment price and positive, safely carrying on the reform innovation, introducing the competitive system unceasingly, doing well the equipment price level regulation, strengthening legal status of plan contract, cultivating the weaponry life cycle expense management pattern vigorously, improving the equipment purchase quality and the military economic efficiency, reducing the purchase cost and cycle, going out "the investment few, the benefit is high" the equipment to purchase the new pathway, which at present appears especially urgent and the need, and which plays a decisive role and has the profound influence on equipment price work next development direction and the management method. From doing well the equipment price level the regulation and the exploration equipment price administration mentality embarks, determined the just equipment price, the realization equipment funds benefit maximization, is the practical significance and the goal which this article studies is at. This article altogether is divided five chapters, the contents mainly are: First chapter: introductory remarks. From the topic research background, the significance and the research of equipment price control method at home and abroad in present situation, elaborated the proposition research objective necessity. Second chapter: Outline of Equipment price control method. Mainly from the formation and the development of equipment price theory, and the connotation and historical development process of equipment price control method, proposing the important status of equipment price control in the equipment construction work. Is the same with the general commodity price, the equipment price also is equips the value the currency performance, responded (national security) is approved by the market the work content. But the approval of market (national security), is for satisfy the entire social the safety requirement, in order to gain the goal of national defense, which has the sharing and the sociality of the subject of consumption. Had decided consumer's increase cannot cause the production cost change, namely more than 1 consumers cause the society marginal cost is zero. Expense sharing had also decided the members of different social classes all have the enhancement national defense the duty and the responsibility, all should first complete the equipment ordering and the production task including civil enterprise's any domestic enterprise, these duties and the responsibility have the national law compulsorily. From this significance, the equipment price control work has its special connotation and the essential factor. To equips the price the control materially is through to equips the price level the regulation and the equipment price management, seeks under the plan quantity condition to equip the price the justice, causes the enterprise to obtain as far as possible decides under the quantity condition the marginal cost, the coordination undertakes to manufacture the unit and the army economic relations Third chapter: Equipment price control movement foundation. Take the commodity attribute which equips as breakthrough point, to equipped the market the characteristic, the effect, the function, the intrinsic structure as well as cultivates under the market economy condition the equipment market system related question to carry on the analysis, discussed under the socialist market economy condition to equip the price control the economic theory foundation. To equips commodity attribute recognizing, is advantageous in breaks the profession, the department boundary, the realization equipment development, the production socialization. Because equips the development production the war industry business unit which assigns by the country carries on, monopolizes into this system the malpractice. The acknowledgement equipment commodity attribute, moves towards the market, according to the commodity economy development request for the defense industry, breaks the division of vertical (i.e., the military and civilian division and the seal defense industry system, enhances the equipment development production the socialized degree, has created the prerequisite. But equips the price mechanism the function is limited, because equips the plan is according to the national security need, must guarantee the certain deterrent scale, therefore cannot subscribe as a result of price GAO Eshoo, the price is somewhat low but subscribes much. Looked from producer's angle, also cannot because some equipment price is high, transfers but goes into production or enhances the output, also cannot because the price somewhat low or does not produce on the reduced production. Therefore price in equips in the market to equip the resources the setting-up is extremely limited, often is take completing which plans as the goal performs to formulate, serves and obeys in the equipment construction general situation. The fourth chapter: The present situation analysis of equipment price control method. Through situation and existence question analysis which current faces to the weaponry, analyzed the present equipment price control method and between the current equipment developments demand with emphasis not the compatibility. First, the equipment price level regulation vacancy, the function which regulates from the military looked, in the current national economy national economy development, the income assignment policy and the military expenses purchasing power decides in the situation, the price fluctuation is affects the equipment price level the primary factor. Along with the raw material, the personnel wages and so on the expense level unceasing rise, the war industry enterprise under the fixed price pattern which the military goods price entire cost compensates, does not have the external pressure, its response is not makes the constitutive under the military expenses restraint adjustment (this kind of structure adjustment to contain product structure adjustment, devotionment structure adjustment, production method structure adjustment), but is craves in "passes the burden", does not drop (even enhances) under the goal in the profit level to the army implementation to pass the burden, causes the equipment price level the unceasing rise, enormous influence to equipment construction development; the second is the information mechanism inherent contradictions and the adjustment low efficiency, elaborated the equipment particularity from seven stratification planes to decide the information processing or price adjustment plan itself received is separated from the market supply and demand strength the benefit relations restriction, from current state-owned enterprise's management system and single-product economy entity characteristic analysis, existence information not symmetry and benefit conflict these two influences military goods price science reasonable establishment fundamental question; Three is the defense industry system establishment also has the imperfect place, ten big war industries groups' separation, only was had the change in the management pattern, because the product nature and the development direction have the essentially difference, the market entered mutually with the competition is extremely difficult, at the same time because had enterprise group's nature, for group's benefit, could implement the profession conformity, raise the department to enter the threshold, the implementation competes in disguised form and so on the counter- market mechanism behavior, did not favor equips the market the formation and the equipment construction development; Four is present price structure means related equipment cost recognizing, also is "occurs namely is reasonable" is accountant the premise, is one kind completely take the seller as the leading means, does not favor enhances the military expenses the use benefit. The fifth chapter: Reality choice of equipment price control. Through to equips the price level the regulation, creates a stable just equipment price level to form the environment, in this foundation, to equips the price structure the stage, the process and the control method conducts the thorough research, by forms under a set of reasonable equipment price control method or the instruction mentality adapted current social economy condition.

Title: The Study on Training of the Rural Labor Force for Transferring under the Backgrounds of Urbanization
Abstract: In accordance with the general rules governing the development of urbanization, the building of a comfortable society and the realization of China's overall strategic objectives of the objective requirements, taking into account long-term residency system in the past under the influence of urbanization lags behind the store's huge potential, China is experiencing accelerating urbanization process.Speed up the process of rural urbanization of rural labor, the farmers need to objectively continuing education and vocational training in the human capital investment needs related to national public policy and system adjustments and innovation. The population movements and urbanization theory, human capital theory, immigrants adapt to social theory and the theory of the basic theoretical foundation, borrowed a large amount of related survey data, in the rural labor and urbanization and human capital relations basic posture on the basis of analysis from the urbanization of the state's macroeconomic objectives and coordinated urban and rural development, enterprise development and rural labor into cities, and as soon as the training of the various needs of rural labor, and government-related public policy arrangements, the main responsibility for identifying training, the training carrier supply, training and other related elements of the supply situation analysis training of rural labor "supply-demand" matching of a theoretical and practical assessment of the problem, based on this, identify problems and propose countermeasures recommendations. In the analysis of the key issues are explored under a dual household registration management system at the core of the macro background and goals as the main line to urbanization. Chapter 1 introduction, mainly on the background of this basic research and fundamental content The significance of the research background and the selection of subjects, some of the basic concepts related; the relevant documentation has been summarized; the theoretical basis; the data sources and basic research methods; the research framework; this innovative point and difficult. Chapter 2, urbanization background rural labor relations and the basic trend analysis of human capital Education, training, labor is the rational allocation of human resources development among the important ways, human capital formation and appreciation of the important channels. China between urban and rural, regional differences exist between the levels of socio-economic development of rural labor mobility is the driving force and foundation. Since the beginning of reform and opening up, the rural labor force from rural areas to cities, from underdeveloped central and western regions to eastern especially in the southeast coastal region of the expanding scale. From the rural labor to junior middle school education level among the population as the main, they educated and trained labor force in rural areas is higher than the proportion of the overall level, but compared with the urban labor force is still low. Human capital stock of the current rural labor shortage is rural labor and urbanization of the main obstacles. Chapter 3, the rural labor training needs-analysis under the trend of Urbanization Training is due to the transfer of rural labor to urban labor market culture of quality and professional skills of the labor demand changes forward, leading to the supply of training. This part to the human capital theory, education equitable theory, the re-socialization theory as basic theoretical prop from industrialization, urbanization and coordinated urban and rural development objective needs from the "workers shortage", "mechanic shortage" and the sustainable development needs of enterprises and peasant workers from the city and plans to upgrade the capacity of the employment needs of individuals and urbanization several aspects proved the need for rural labor training; and further from the cities to farmers with low levels of personal qualities perspective analysis, add a peasant workers need training. Chapter 4, the transfer training supply-analysis of rural labor under the trend of Urbanization Supply is adequate and effective training and the transfer of rural labor to urban successful completion of the course an important guarantee for urban residents. Rural labor training is the key to the smooth development of the project funds. Rural labor training acts are external decisions of the rural labor training must be the main responsibility of the government, enterprises, farmers shared the personal and social forces. Currently, the policy level, government rural labor Although the importance of training has been profound understanding, but with our huge low-skill, low-quality transfer huge quantities of labor arising from the training needs compared carrier, finance, content and many other factors supply or demand factors all exhibited show the gap between supply and demand situation. Therefore, we must adopt a long-term effective mechanism to ensure the sustainable functioning of the training funds. Chapter 5, the rural labor training constraints analysis under the trend of Urbanization On the other hand, the systemic factors and individual farmers have also led to a lower quality of peasant workers mobility, low degree of organization, with low levels of employment-based stamina, This training also constitute the transfer of rural labor force certain constraints. Chapter6, Summary International experience and the Policy recommendations of China Through the training of rural labor supply and demand and constraints analysis for other countries to carry out the process of urbanization, rural labor training experience. To ensure that the urbanization of the rural labor training background to the smooth conduct of the work and planning target, the paper put forword to some advice. The major innovation may be following aspects: First,the training of peasant workers with significant investment is external nature. State intervention is the optimal solution to the supply of workers compensation feasibility external training is the solution. the State should be leading, but it is not entirely sense of investment-led training, more accurately refers to countries in the institutional arrangements and allocation of resources should take the lead responsibility. Second, the training of farmers made key factors that funding solutions: to increase the state of public finances in the meantime, special training through the establishment of rural labor to expand its training fund sources. Third, with the current government-led rural labor flow-oriented training model different from the equity and efficiency of this principle, should be established to make profit from the practice-oriented training model. Keywords: Urbanization; the Rural Laboer Force; Transferring; the Peasant-worker; Traning

Title: On Public Capital
Abstract: The public capital is the capitalization of public assets, the organic unification of the public-owned content and capital form, the key to understand that the socialist basic system combines with market economic system, and the key and peculiar category of the socialist market economy. It only contacts the certain historical stage especially the primary stage of socialism, produces with formulation of socialist market economy, develops but develops, and withers away as it withers away. As the general form of value, the public capital is a kind of factor of production in conformity with large-scale social production, playing an irreplaceable role to the productivity development of the primary stage of socialism; And as the special form of value, the public capital reflect the double social relationships of " the labor engages the capital and the capital engages the labor " under the socialist market economy condition , it is " cube barranca of Kraft " that must be crossed in the socialist development process. This text divides six chapters altogether. Chapter one: the introduction, mainly introduces the reason, current situation, method and frame of the public capital studying, and has defined the public capital category. Understanding the public capital in the historical process of socialism movement, regarding the emergence, development of the public capital as the basic clue, finding the basic law of socialist market economic development, thus undertaking the historical mission of the theory worker of Marxism, it is our main reason of studying public capital. But as the speech of current situation of the studying on the public capital, the energy that the academia invests is far unbecoming to compare with the status of public capital as key category of socialist market economy. Studying the public capital, just as studying other social relationships, there is an academic position question, this is unavoidable as for researcher. We stand at Marxism position, use Marxist history and logic unified method and contradiction analytic approach study the public capital mainly; At the same time in order to avoid causing it through the dispute of the institute type as much as possible, used the analytic approach of the real example in a large amount too. Using these methods, we have investigated the public capital category, have analyzed the forming, producing, circulating, distributing, running and managing of the public capital, and sum up and analyze its contradiction on the basis of summarizing these practices, then analyze the development trend of the public capital further according to the public capital contradiction. This is basic train of thought and frame of this text. Coming to define in terms of its content, form and history regulation, the public capital is the capitalizing of public assets, it is the unifying organically of the public-owned content and capital form, it is the value that can bring surplus value to the socialist state and collective. It is the key category and peculiar category of the socialist market economy, only contacts the certain historical stage especially the primary stage of socialism, produces with formulation of socialist market economy, develops but develops, and withers away as it withers away . Chapter two: The forming of the public capital. Mainly research socialized gradual progress of the private capital and production of the public capital in the socialist state. Investigating the socialist movement from fact and the public capital in the historical process of socialist movement, we find two roads run parallel with: The socialization of private capital in developed capitalist nations and the production of public capital in socialist states whose economy and culture are relatively backward. Outwardly it seems that the two take their own roads, irrelevant at all, but they closely connect and influence each other in fact. As to historical order, formerly socializing of private capital in capitalist nations, producing of public capital in socialist state in after, the production of public capital walks abreast just with a certain stage of private capital socialization, and the socialization of private capital in developed capitalist nations form the background and external reason that public capital produce in socialist states of economy and culture relatively backward. Private capital, with the constant development of the large-scale social production, grow from ownership of the private capital to ownership of private share capital after going through one, and then reach the course of ownership of corporation share capital (namely corporation capital ownership ). The most obvious trend that this course embodies is the socialization day by day of the capital. And the final result of private capital socialization day by day must be “turning the capital into the public one which belongs to all social members' property”, “it will lose its class nature ". Public capital, the economic category which an author of a classic of Marxism had never involved, in the process of reform and opening-up of socialist state that economy and culture is relatively backward, under the background of fact that the private capital is socialized and the globalization process is accelerated day by day, arises at the historic moment as the setting-up of the socialist market economy system. Public capital, there is course of a primitive accumulation too. “Depriving depriver", namely the private capital leaving over old China was changed into the socialist state-owned property; Leading and transforming the self-employed laborer, namely carries on the transformation to agriculture and private industry and commerce; Implementing the high accumulation rate, namely carries on " depriving oneself " of the socialism type; Through " scissors difference", by mending the worker's industrial policy agriculturally, the value was shifted from the agricultural surplus labor. The way of these public capital primitive accumulation, though not like the capitalist primitive accumulation was " written into human annals with the characters of blood and fire " like that, adopt ultra compulsive means of economy too , accumulate conditions of " labor hires capital " and " capital hires labor " within shorter time, namely to form the “ prehistory ” of public capital. Chapter three: The production, circulation and distribution of the public capital. Mainly research the universal law and special law of the production, circulation and distribution of public capital, as well as how to perfect the system that the public capital is produced, circulated and distributed. The production and circulation of the public capital follows the universal law of the production and circulation of the capital, and there is its own particularity too at the same time. Decided by the production of public capital, the distribution of public capital adopts the double level of distribution under socialist market economy, namely the mode combined distributing in money and distributing according to work, of which the first grade is distribution in money, the second is distribution according to work. The law that the public capital was produced, circulated and distributed, has reflected the basic state of circuitous development of public ownership under socialist market economy. Public capital production is the unity of work course and value multiplication course. In this course, not only the use value of meeting working people's needs, but also the surplus value of public capital has been produced. This is the characteristic of public capital production. For this reason, public assets turn into the public capital, it is the prerequisite that public capital is produced; the workforce turns into the goods under the socialist market economy condition, it is the prerequisite that public assets turn into the public capital. As value production, the public capital production must follow the universal law that value is produced. To encourage the enterprises to compete in the market, to mould public-owned enterprises into a qualified market main body, to set up modern enterprise system, to adjust the state-run economic layout and development strategy on the whole, it is an inevitable request that value is produced. The public capital circulation follows the universal law that the capital circulates, such as the circulation law of the capital, the turnover law of the capital and the law of that the means of production have priority to increase; and it has its own particularity too at the same time. Because of the decision of double goal of production and management, public capital circulation is not regulated all by surplus law of value and law of value. To the disposition of public capital resources, the planned mechanism will be used frequently besides using the market mechanism. Because of the special position and function of the public capital in our national economy, the flow, circulation of the public capital will exert an important influence on macro-economy operation. So to perfect the public capital circulation system, we must combine universal law and special law that the public capital circulates, must adhere to the scrupulous attitude to advance and retreat and structural adjustment of the public capital. We should follow the universal law of market economy, should consider the will of the people and the national conditions too. The distribution of the public capital is in the leading position under the socialist market economy condition in general capital distribution. The general capital distribution means the total distribution pattern of the national income under the socialist market economy condition, namely the distribution pattern of the total surplus value of public capital and private capital and laborer’s salary, its essence is to handle the country, enterprise and individual interests well. The general capital distribution is rational basically in our country, and the incomes of the country, enterprise and resident are balanced on the whole. But a lot of question are exposed and happened too at the same time, especially such that financial support is heavily different under different industry, so that some industries can not get very good development for a long time. And that the wage level of different trade draws heavy, this cause the society to pay close attention to fair problem. As regards itself, the distribution of public capital means the interests partition among the country or the collective and laborer. Because the relations between public capital and labor are double employer-employee relationships under the socialist market economy condition, namely relations that " labor hiring capital-capital hiring labor ", so, the public capital distribution is divided into two levels accordingly: The first level is to assign according to the relation of " capital hires labor ", namely the country obtained public surplus value in the capacity of investor, worker obtained salary in the provider's identity with the workforce. Therefore, the distribution of the first level is the distribution that is determined by the market mechanism, paying attention to efficiency. The second level is to reallocate according to the relation of “labor hires capital ", the united laborer realizes its right that asks for surplus value in the capacity of final owner. So the distribution of the second level is carried on in the form of macro adjustments and controls by the country, laying particular emphasis on the justice. According to the current situation of the public capital distribution, the publicly-owned enterprise's overall wage level advances by leaps and bounds since reform and opening-up, but the out-of-balance question of the structure exists too, wages level difference of different trade, different area are all greater, the public capital should solve the inside fair problem too when being distributed. The problem existing in the field of public capital distribution will be solved effectively only through perfecting public capital distribution system constantly. This kind of distribution system has already been different from public assets under planned economic system to distribute, also different from capital distribution in the capitalist country. We should pay attention to efficiency through the function of the market mechanism, as well as pay attention to justice through strengthening government regulating function in income distribution. How to set up efficient and fair distribution system, it is the big problem that we still need to probe further in practice. Chapter four: the operation and management of the public capital. Mainly research how to run and manage the public capital according to its essence and law. The problems of public capital in the course of producing, circulating and distributing, show evidently as how to operate and manage public capital at present. Public capital operation is to operate it according to the law that the public capital moves, to make the use of the public capital give play to the greatest efficiency. The main form of the public capital operation is the state-run capital operation. As the main respect of the public capital operation, the state-run capital operation regard improving the utilization benefit of the state-run capital as object, regard market mechanism as the basic means. It is a kind of operational and managerial activities that on the basis of the separation of two rights of state-run capital, the country proceeds from whole state-run economic development strategy as the investor, enterprises proceed from their own development strategy as the microcosmic main body, the two go on scientific plan and effective operation at different levels. However, the public capital operation is at its initial stage yet, there are still a lot of questions in practice, such that the public-owned enterprises are not complete market main bodies, the non market-oriented factors still exist; The capital market development is not perfect yet; Ignore the production and management, put undue emphasis on the capital operation; The social security system is still imperfect, etc.. In order to solve the problem that exist in the public capital operation, make the public capital operation more efficient with benefit, the most key one is to set up and perfect the supervision and management system of the public capital. While using experience of management of the foreign state-run capital for reference, to summarize the successful management mode appearing in the state-owned economy evolution of our country actively, basic train of thought has been proposed by the 16th National Congress that "the central government and local government fulfils contributor’s duty on behalf of the country respectively ". According to this train of thought, the State Council passes through and issues "the provisional administrative regulations of the supervision of enterprise's state-run assets”, which indicates that the state-run economic reform of our country develops from the stage of the definition of property right and the exploration of property right mode to the management stage of the public capital. Certainly, the regulation is only “interim regulation", a lot of questions especially property right questions are still need to study and probe further in practice. Chapter five: public capital contradiction. Mainly research inherent contradiction, external contradiction and the rule of public capital development as well as the impact of the public capital contradiction on its production and running. The production, circulation, distribution, running and management of the public capital, is shown as circuitous advancement in practice, which is decided by the inherent contradiction of the public capital and limited by its external contradiction again at the same time. The inherent contradiction of the public capital is the contradiction of public-owned content and the capital form, and it stipulates the basic trend of the public capital development. The external contradiction of the public capital is the contradiction of public capital and private capital, and it plays a role in accelerating or delaying the development of the public capital. The expansion of the public capital inherent contradiction is its production, circulation, distribution, running and management, and the expansion of the public capital external contradiction is the concrete mode of the competition as well as cooperation between public capital and private capital. The inherent contradiction of public capital concentratedly embodies in the relation of a series of unity of opposites including non-exclusiveness and exclusiveness, social benefit and economic benefits, worker controlling the means of production and the means of production controlling worker, distribution according to work and distribution in money etc. Meanwhile, in two kinds of concrete forms of the public capital -- state-run capital and collective capital, the form of expression of these contradictions is different to some extent. The inherent contradiction of the public capital is having important influence on production and management of the public capital, because it is embodied in the contradiction of the ownership of the capital and the power of management in practice, namely the contradiction of who own the capital and who run the capital. This is exactly the key problem that we make sure progress but do not solved at all so far in our country socialist market economic development process. The external contradiction of the public capital includes two respects of belligerence and identity. As regards belligerence, it is the relation that the public capital and the private capital are distinguished and competed for, and there are obvious differences in the respects, such as the interests goal and way that the two are pursuing, the distribution method of surplus value and the relation of the two and working, and the capital accumulation way and trend, etc., at the same time the two are carrying on keen competition on the market as different interests main body. As to identity, it is the relation of interdependence, transfixion each other and transform each other between public capital and private capital, embodying in the cooperation on the market of two, such as participating in each other by shares, permeating each other, and the transformation of control power or the transformation of the capital form taking place when the condition is ripe. But the total trend is that the private capital turns into the public capital more and more, and in competing, the public capital studies experience of the private capital constantly, revises its own deficiency , thus improves and strengthens itself in the market competition rapidly, obtains more and more shareholding , and realizes the transition from expansion of quantity to qualitative leap finally, finishes this specific historical category of the public capital with revolutionary significance to deny itself, thus, the public ownership can be realized in more appropriate form on higher, more perfecting and riper level. Chapter six: the sublation of the private capital and expansion of the public capital. Mainly research the historical process of the self-sublation of private capital and the historical trend of the expansion of public capital. The two points to the same goal that socialism will replace capitalism finally through public capital replace private capital. The inexorable development trend of public capital contradiction is that the public capital denies the private capital and finally denies itself, and the private capital itself has a course self-denied. Development from the form of the private owner to the shareholding system form and then to the form of the state-run capital, has reflected the course that the private capital transforms from private capital to social capital with constant development of the large-scale social production. This transformation has relaxed the social contradiction of the capitalism, and has accumulated the condition for the new mode of production. However, it has not gone beyond the range of the private capital, so Marx calls this kind of transformation "the passive sublation". In the process of the self-sublation of the private capital, there has appeared in " worker's own cooperative factory " within the capitalist society, which can be regarded as a kind of economic form similar to the public capital, for it sublates the opposition between capital and labor, Marx calls this kind of sublation as "the active sublation". In the current international market, the position of the public capital is similar to that of the “cooperative factory" in the capitalist domestic market. Though the public capital is still very small and weak can be regarded as it “the first breach that old form is open in the old form ", there are far-reaching meanings. The expansion of capital is the natural instinct of it. The expansion of the private capital promotes the process of the economic globalization, which makes the capitalism grow from country's monopoly capitalism to international monopoly capitalism, and these form the international background that public capital monopolizes with the competition. Through summarizing the historical law of capital development, we can find that monopoly, despite the negative effect of suppressing the technological progress, is one chapter that must be written in the history of the capital. It is the centralized inevitable outcome of production, yet conversely promotes production to be centralized further again. It is the catalyst which makes capital socialized to form the extensive capital, and conversely the socialized capital often accumulates the condition that monopoly expands. Monopoly squeezes but does not eliminate the competition, the competition between the monopolies is larger, the degree is fiercer. The modes of the profit of monopoly are "ed leave metrically together" as monopoly develops till today, on the one hand it obtaining monopoly profits relying on its monopoly position, on the other hand speeding up technological development to keep its leading advantage in the trade. So, while seeing negative consequence monopolized at the present age, we should see its function as the social capital catalyst objectively too. The public capital must allow “rational monopoly”, the domestic monopoly facing the international monopoly capital, if the public capital wants to form the enterprises colony analogous to the scale of the capital to participate in the international competition. The purpose that we maintain the “rational monopoly” of public capital is to accelerate the speed of accumulation of the public capital, make it rank among the ranks of the transnational group quickly, as many as possible as much as possible. But the public capital has just come into being, and still in transforming, it also mainly lays particular emphasis on inside merger at present, so the strategy of implementing “walking out " will be a very long course. Even so, but paces that the public capital expands will not stop. The motive force that the public capital expands depends on the pursuit of publicly-owned surplus value and pressure of the market competition, yet the trend that the public capital expands depends on the development of inherent contradiction and external contradiction of the public capital. So, the dialectical movement course in practice of contradiction of the public capital is the historical course naturally of public capital accumulation, and the historical course that the public capital expands constantly as the ones that accumulate go on continuously. And with the development of contradiction movement of the public capital, the accumulation of the public capital will develop in the unity of twists and advancement too, and the public capital will demonstrate certain wave accordingly too in its expansion. And just in the course of such dialectical development, the public capital will sublate itself constantly, also sublate the private capital in the course of expansion of it at the same time, until finish its historical mission and exit from socialist stage of economic history.

Title: Preparation and application of in-situ geochemical sensors on seafloor
Abstract: There are abundant strategic metal resources, energy sources and biological resources in International seabed area. It is an important supporting system for human life maintaining and sustainable social development. Seafloor hydrothermal system no only have potential tremendous economic value but also have the active significance for research in physical movement in deep earth, tectonic activities, plate movement and origin of life. Nowadays, subjects of marine science, geology and biology face the same mission of investigation of seafloor hydrothermal system. Upon the support of State 863 Program, a set of geochemical sensor with independent intellectual property containing reference electrode, pH electrode, H2S electrode and dissoloved oxygen electrode is prepared for in-situ detecting on seafloor. It is useful to help people study hydrothermal system from geological, chemical, biological and other aspects, and thus greatly promote research in the field of sea resources detecting, sea environment observation and protection, and marine science. After studying in existing geochemical sensor and comparing previous preparation methods of these electrodes at home and aboard, the methods are taken as following: using noble metal as basic material, realizing the solidification and micromation of detecting electrodes; using AgCl melt to make reference electrode, enhancing its lifetime; using epoxy resin with ultra thin silver power as the middle layer to prepare Ag/Ag2S electrode, enhancing its detecting limit; using Na2O2 melt to prepare Ir/IrO2 electrode coated with Nafion, a kind of proton selective substance produced by DuPon, enhancing its resistance ability; using Au coated with DePeX membrane as DO electrode, enhancing its liftime and detecting ability. Constantly improve the electrodes performance by experimental calibrations according to the feedback. As a collaboration project between Zhejiang University and the University of Minnesota, a joint team has been working together on in-situ geochemical sensors for seafloor hydrothermal system. The device had been working continuously in a microbial cluster near TICA-vent for about 12 days and realized long-term chemical compositon monitoring for the first time in this area. Time-series records show that temperature fluctuates between 10C and 20.5C, and total dissolved varies from 7.4 to 27.3 mol/L. Through the analysing results of detecting data, it is found that temperature and chemical component concentration change periodically could be refered to tide influence. As a universal technical platform, in-situ geochemical sensor can be used widely. It has great potential applications in natural gas hydrate detecting, seabed observation system and other fields. Research results in this paper can reduce the gap in deep seafloor resources investigation technology between China and western countries and lay a sound foundation for deep-sea mineral resources investigation, exploration and exploitation.

Title: Law Text and Jurisditonal Practice
Abstract: Kin-relationship Volum of Civil Law of the Repblic of China is the achievement in massive law-making after the foundation of the Nanjing Guomingtang government and the first law on kinship relationship enacted and cariied out during the modern times in China. Its revised version is still in effect in Taiwan even today. Law text is enriched with its historical and cultural connotations. Therefore, through the analytical reading of a certain law text, we can not only deepen the understanding of the forms it takes in a given historical period but also can dicover the interactions between politics, economy and cuture at that time by means of searching into the historical background of the law-making. The issues Kin-realtionship Law concerns are mostly minor issues that closely related to the life of common citizens. In this sense, Kin-relationship law is actually a mirror reflecting the reality of civil society, i.e.the life of common citizens. Kin-relationship Law of a certain historical period is able to reflect the ethical and moral orientations of people at that time. From the narration of law texts, which are usually ignored by researchers, a “civil society”expressed by the law-makers can be reconstructed. It is possible that there is distance between this “civil society”tainted withlaw-makers’ subjective experience and the real one. Yet it is the distance which this paper focuses on, that is, the issue of how national law interacts with civil society. A study of Kin-relationship Volum of Civil Law of the Repblic of China from this perspective will bring new insights into the legal system during the rule of Nanjing Guomingtang government. Compared with the static texts oflaw,jurisdictional practice is much more complex. If a volume of law texts is to be effective, it is not only associated with the quality of jurisdical system and other relevant power structures but also with the legal consciousness of citizens and the expertise of juridical workers. As Pan Guangdan states: “The management of things partially results from manpower and partially from the interlocking and constraining factors of its environment. Manpower, which is undoubtedly part of the interlocking and constraining factors, is nothing more than that.If things are dissociated from the other interlocking and constraining factors except manpower which becomes the sole controlling factor; things will be perverted in its forms and exhausted its potentiality. ” Therefore, through the study of law texts and jurisdictional practice, various changes during the process when the static law texts are carried out in juridical actions can be revealed. The introduction part focuses on perspective and methodology employed in the paper. Under guidance of “descriptive” and “explanative” principle, Kin-relationship law is explored from the perspective of jurisprudence, history, sociology as well as anthropology. Chapter Two includes the historical retrospect of the law-making on kin-relationship laws in traditional Chinese society, its basic features as well as the changes it undergoes with the political, economical, and cultural development of modern Chinese society. The legal development of any society and time is deeply rooted in its given society. Consequently, the profound and precise explanation of a certain law can only be obtained from the understanding of its historical back ground. Kin-relationship Volum of Civil Law of the Repblic of China is no exception. The following five aspects are the backgrounds and factors that influenced the law-making: first, the great political and economical changes in China since late Qing Dynasty; second, the necessity for the withdrawal of exterritoriality; third, the pressure imposed by the thinking and practice of Women’s Liberation Movement; fourth, the requirement of the creed and constitution of Guomingtang; lastly, the new trend in the law-making of Kin-relationship laws at the beginning of the 20th century. At the same time, the central political committee of Guomingtang demanded that “Three Principles of the People”, as the ideology of Guomingtang, be planted in the lawmaking. As a result, it is equally important to be clear about the legal connotations of“Three Principles of the People” as well as its significance to the design of the legal system of the Kin-relationship Volum of Civil Law of the Repblic of China. Generally speaking, the legal system of Kin-relationship Volum consists of marriage system and kinship system. this paper, with an eye on the marriage customs of the common citizen, explores deep into the original intention for the design of the legal system and the distance between the national law Kin-relationship Volum and the customs of the populace. at the same time, the paper analysizes the cause for the distance: the dilemmatic choice law-makers faced between the transplantation of western laws and employment of native laws. Because of factors in and outside the country, overdue emphasis was put on catching up with the latest international trend in law-making when concrete jurisdiction clauses were made. As a consequence, although the legal system is trendy, it is far from enough to meet the practical need of the populace. As the Chinese poem expresses, “the man inside the Mountain Lu can never get a panoramic view of it.” It is the same case with the study of law texts. The comparison of one law text with another one may provides a new perspective. This paper compares comprehensively the Kin-relationship Volum with the marriage and family laws in the Revolutionary Bases of the same period in fpour aspects, namely, lawmaking techniques and codes of law, legal language, basic content and the actual effect. In addition, the paper analyses the differences between the two and reflects on them. The jurisdictional practice of Kin-relationship Volumis is also a key point in the study. It is dealt in two parts. Part one studies how Kin-relationship Volum was carried out in jurisdictional practice by analyzing the civil verdicts of the Supreme Court of Nanjing Guomingtang government and those of local courts like chengdu. Did the jurisdical workers settle marriage and family issues according to legal principle and concrete clauses of Kin-relationship Volum? Were there any problems occurring during the process? what factors caused the problems? These are the questioned discussed in the paper. Part two investigates the interactive relationship between Kin-relationship Volum in its jurisdictional practice and the social customs of common citizens. As a law that addresses the “private affairs”of common people, it can not escape from the influence of social customs. While customs are having their effect on Kin-relationship Volum, the law is also has its direct impact on social customs: confirming, normalizing and reinforcing customs that are consistent with the social development while reforming, eliminating and expelling harmful customs among the citizens. As the first modern marriage law in China, it is problematic, to some extent, in both its legal text and its jurisdictional practice. However, to gain the correct knowledge of these problems, it is wiser to view them in the larger historical context during the rule of Nanjing Guomingtang government. The occurrence of any historical phenomena can not be simple explained in an “either-or” way. Therefore, while studying Kin-relationship Volum ，without probing deep into the legal system of law, researchers should avoid the tendency to jump to a hasty denial results from the ideological influence that the law is made by the government representative for the interests of landlords and bourgeoisie.

Title: The study of Chinatown as an urban artifice and its impact on the Chinese community in London
Abstract: Sociologists claim that the ethnic Chinese community in the United Kingdom cannot be spatially defined. The first reason is that the widely scattered Chinese catering businesses-still the main source of employment for incoming Chinese migrants - makes the Chinese community too dispersed to form residential enclaves. Secondly, the evasive nature of the ethnic Chinese population towards government assistance and strong sense of ethnic solidarity also makes them an "invisible community". The Confucian philosophy governing their way of life further reinforces patrilineal links oriented towards ancestral villages in China. Recent renewed interests in the future of London's Chinatown as the result of a recent development plan has prompted this report to investigate whether a spatial pattern of occupation by the Chinese community exists in Chinatown, or if it is simply an intelligent urban artifice exploited for touristic and commercial purposes. Unlike its historical East End predecessor which has never been exclusively Chinese, present day London Chinatown can be qualified as a "persistent enclave". Whilst it crucially accommodates co-ethnic businesses and facilities for the oriental population, it is not the sole centre for the Chinese community. At the outset, studies on the Chinese have been confounded by their lack of assimilation into host society, inconsistent methods of data representation from the population census and high levels of suspicion by the immigrant community when conducting fieldwork. By first understanding historical developments in London's two Chinatowns and concepts pertaining to Chinese ethnography, this helps substantiate the demographic data, changing land use and household occupation by the Chinese community in Limehouse around 1890 and Soho today. The global and local relationship for these two areas are also analysed syntactically through spatial maps derived from Booth's Map of Poverty of 1889 and a current axial map of London respectively. The spatially-oriented case study of Soho's Chinatown identifies through a public survey a collective mental representation of its neighbourhood area that differs from its administrative designation. Pedestrian movement studies suggest that there is a distinct spatial and temporal pattern of occupation amongst the ethnic Chinese which differs from non-Chinese tourists and locals which can be syntactically measured. The findings support the view that a complex social and spatial relationship exists between the two disparate groups that utilise Chinatown. Whilst its commercial success is crucial to maintaining Chinatown's public profile, it also allows it to continue to function as an important centre for the Chinese community.

Title: The impact of climate change on the progress towards the Millennium Development Goals related to malaria
Abstract: Today, climate change is a major issue discussed by the media worldwide. One of the consequences regularly debated is the impact of climate change on health. Malaria is known to be climate sensitive and is therefore one of the diseases believed to increase with changes in climate. This paper investigates how climate change will affect the progress towards the Millennium Development Goals 4 and 6, in relation to malaria, in sub-Saharan Africa. The study is conducted as a literature review, where secondary data has been analysed. Malaria is believed to be directly affected by climate change through a rise in temperature and change in rainfall patterns. Both parasite and vector are dependent on temperature to develop, while water is needed for breeding. Less research has been conducted on the indirect effects of climate change on malaria. Some of the predicted results of climate change are drought, food shortages, conflicts and population movement. These consequences will most likely increase humans’ risk of being infected with malaria. Based on Breman’s (2001) framework, a new framework has been developed where the effects of climate change are taken into consideration. The framework show the convergence between climate change and increased malaria burden through extrinsic determinants; environmental conditions, social and behavioural factors, and economical and political factors. With global warming the world could see a retreat away from the Millennium Development Goals. In order to reduce the worst impact, greenhouse gases need to be cut, health infrastructure strengthened and international interventions towards malaria reduction need to adapt to a changing environment.

Title: A discursive analysis of the struggle for hegemony between the ejercito zapatista de liberacion nacional ( ezln) and the mexican government
Abstract: The Zapatista rebellion which broke out on January 1, 1994, on the very day that the North Atlantic Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) was implemented can be considered a local response to the global policy shift of the Mexican government under President Salinas de Gortari (1988-1994).  This thesis includes a detailed discursive analysis of the annual speeches of the president, and the annual declarations of the EZLN (Ejército Zapatista de Liberación Nacional).  One of the basic assumptions of the thesis is that these political narratives played a strategic role in a struggle to gain hegemonic acceptance amongst the Mexican people for the respective national projects which each side envisioned. The initial chapters present a description of the socio-historical context in Mexico and of the EZLN as a social movement.  Chapters III and IV describe the theoretical methodological framework of the thesis, which integrates a Gramscian approach to hegemony with discursive theory and two main directions in critical discourse analysis (CDA): discourse and social change and the discourse-historical approach.  Categories of the discourse theory have been connected to categories in CDA, thus creating a framework which allows for the analysis of data in the light of a hegemonic struggle. The analysis helps to clarify concepts in discourse theory, especially ‘empty signifiers’, ‘nodal points’, ‘myth’ and ‘imaginary’.  The integration of discourse theory and CDA makes possible an analysis of the discourse of the Mexican government and the EZLN in terms of processes of re-articulation.  Thus, Salinas de Gortari rearticulates the national future of Mexico in terms of civic nationalism and liberal democracy; and the EZLN in terms of ethnic nationalism and a radical democracy.  The final chapters discuss the stakes in this conflict and consider it in terms of the struggle, on the part of the EZLN, for the right to be different.

Title: Imagining 'home': Korean migrant women's identities in the UK
Abstract: This thesis examines how individual women's desires and social situations can trigger migration as well as the complex and multifaceted effects of geographical mobility on women's lives and the formation of their identities. As a growing number of people move across national boundaries and the range of contemporary migration channels have opened to new breadths, an understanding of current migration practice needs to consider one's specific status within a wide range of types. Through the case of Korean migrant women in the UK, this research challenges the simple assumption of migrants as people who move for only economic purposes as well as the victimisation and homogenisation of Asian migrant women. Based on in-depth individual interviews and a targeted ethnography of Korean communities in the UK, this study explores the experiences of Korean migrant women. The research uses the conceptual framework of "home" and is grounded on the belief that "home" is paradoxically matched with movement rather than a fixed and stable place. The findings suggest that these women's home-making is related to various power relations such as gender relations in contemporary Korea, public attitudes to immigrants and ethnic minorities in the UK, and Korean settlement patterns in the UK. This thesis reveals that the idea of the cosmopolitan/global citizen is promoted to women as a desirable lifestyle and can motivate their migration. Yet these women face certain disjunctions-between the fantasy and the reality of living in the UK; their own self-images and others' stereotypes of them; traditional assumptions about immigrants and their actual lives. Through managing these disjunctions and reshaping their relationships with their families, localities and nation, these women's migration often challenges the traditional binary gender division of masculine- public-outside-work vs. feminine-private-inside-home.
